I owned the Series 1 prior.The battery life on the 3 is outstanding; I've gone almost 2 full days without charging. (With my Series 1, I'd be lucky to make it to bed-time before it died)It seems to track activity better than the Series 1 did, and I LOVE the waterproof feature.I was dying for an activity tracker I could take swimming.Negative remarks on sleep tracking because, in my personal opinion, it is too bulky to wear to bed. Also, the light will shine in my face if I move my wrist (tummy sleeper here)... so on the dock it goes

I was on the face about buying series 3 after breaking my series 5 Apple Watch. I know the new 6 will be out soon so I figured for less than half the price of the 5 this is not a bad deal. Most of the extra ting like ECG on the 5 I never used. I find for my purposes the 3 covers all the bases. Now if the series 6 comes out and it is a must have $200 was not a bad investment rather than $429 for series 5. They both are great watches it just depends on your needs. Even though it’s a little bit of a downgrade I am completely satisfied.

ZERO STARS!If you’re curious to know what the inside of an Apple Watch looks like, check the photos.I purchased this item May 2019, 5 months later and I’m in a pool with the watch in water mode and after 5 minutes the watch stops responding. I had just charged it but thought maybe not enough and it could be dead.After my swim I put it to charge and after an hour, no response. I wait for it to dry thinking maybe SOMEHOW there was water damage, no response.After 24 hours, charged and dry there is still no response. But magically the watch pops open. POPS. It didn’t fall on a hard surface. I didn’t smash it out of frustration. It just POPPED open while sitting on my night stand.5 months. It only took 5 months.It was great when it was working but definitely NOT GREAT when it breaks after JUST 5 months.I DO NOT recommend this product.

This is my first Apple Watch, I’ve always wanted to get one and this was extremely easy to pair to my phone and to download apps on. I use it for tracking my food intake and my workouts as well as my sleep and it’s been really great! The first day I used it the battery didn’t last long but after the next couple charges it’s lasted about 2 days without needing a charge. So far I’m pretty happy with it but I’ll be keeping my eye out on how long the battery lasts me over time. If you’re looking to save some extra money while still getting a lot of the same features I would recommend this watch! So far I’m very happy with my purchase!

So I bought this watch around the time I got the iPhone XR and 3 months later, it is still pristine! I get 2 day battery with no charge and even helps me monitor my exercise. I lost 3,000 calories in 3 months! I bought the series 3 instead of 4 because for me, there is not preferable difference to spend an extra $200. I’d recommend this instead of the 4 any day of 2018/2019

review_title: Great Apple Watch for low price
review_text: I went with this Apple Watch because the newer series are just so expensive. I can say that this watch is great for anyone looking to get an apple device. It is still fast and up to date with all the main features of other apple watches. and the battery lasts for a full day in my experience. However, if you are looking to use ECG features you should get a newer apple watch as this one does not have that feature. Also, it has a limited number of watch faces compared to the newer versions, but that is not that big of a deal. Other than that, if you are just looking for a watch for tracking fitness and checking notifications, this is a great option.
Didn’t connect to my I phone I was probably sent a defective one

Do NOT buy this watch from Amazon right now. As you can see from recent reviews they must have received a defective batch from Apple. The watch does not pair to the phone not matter what. You’ll have to take it to Apple to have them look at it and they’ll end up sending it to a repair center. Save your time and buy directly from Apple.

Ordered this watch to replace my Gen 1 Apple Watch.I had the most difficult time trying to get this watch paired to my iPhone XR.It would initially pair and then it would disconnect with the Pairing Failed message.Even speaking with Amazon support as well as Apple directly, it would not pair and stay paired.Even tried multiple iPhones.My Gen 1 would pair again to my phone without issues.Even when Apple Support gave up, I continued my attempts trying to get it to pair.Finally, I was able to get it to perform the Apple Watch update and it stayed paired.

Apple now makes a series 5, which is newer.I bought this as a gift because the receipient uses the Apple ecosystem.In my opinion there are better non-Apple watches out there at a much better value (price.)I think the Samsung Galaxy Gear is much better than this watch.The Gear S3 came out in 2016 and the Apple Watch 3 came out in 2017.Apple seems to be a few steps behind the cutting edge for many years now.

review_title: Time With this watch will change your life
review_text: This is by far one of the best watches~smart watches I have encounter. This keeps track of my sleeping my breathing and my heart on my Activity my learning everything you can imagine and it also tells time and if you have Mickey or Minnie they will even speak to you the time it even works with my Alexa. A must have Watch oh and did I mention that tells you when I need to drink some water or take my medicine is my own personal assistant I am Loving it and living the big life. Glad this before it’s too late you’ll never regret it!

This little watch is awesome. Although it doesn’t have the cellular connection, I’m usually within arms length of my phone. It’s been a great notification tool, and I use it for navigation as well. The heart rate monitor is pretty accurate too, although during HIIT workouts the sensor kind of freaks out due to so much movement. All in all I’d recommend this watch. It’s a great value.

I've been a FitBit and Garmin user for so many years. When Apple was having a sale on their watches, I had to finally invest and try this out. I'm in love! The series 3 gives me so much when connecting with life & sport. I do not have a separate plan for it so I have to have my phone with me if I go out for a walk or whatever. I like the activity rings that slowly close throughout the day and the reminder to get up and move. I also like being able to get/send texts and phone calls (phone must be nearby). Lastly, I love that it's waterproof and can wear it in the pool.

review_title: Phenomenal I love it got so my compliments already!
review_text: I love it brand new right out of the box very easy to set up in a heart beat it’s remarkable and at this price your getting your money’s worth hands down it’s brand new right out of the box don’t listen to the negativity trust me it’s all legitimate you will love it as we all do!! Get it now like today if your getting this series 3 watch you will not find a better price anywhere!!

The screen on the watch does not work properly. It doesn’t let me touch to select widgets/apps consistently. It doesn’t slide the notifications down appropriately (will get “stuck” half way down the screen). When I select and app or widget and it DOES open up, the screen will immediately go black and back to the home when I “wake” it. It does not consistently wake when the crown is pushed or when I turn my wrist up. I’ve updated it, restarted both the watch and phone and tried messing with settings. I’m super disappointed.

Has major glitch ..Apple is aware of theproblem.. doesn’t mirror your phone like advertised.. they say their working on it..it’s been months now.. and still not fixed..they say just wait till the ne next update ..so.. you buy a new watch and they know it doesn’t work? Yet they continue to sell them?Very disappointed in Apple..I was a fan u til now..even after a replacement they sent.. it still doesn’t work..and the bad thing is... they know about it..poor business practice .. greedy!Now I’m stuck with a watch that doesn’t work properly ...hope this helps..don’t waste your money on this model !

review_title: Fragile product, not worth to pay
review_text: Bought the series 3, 42mm, to replace my Garmin forerunner used to practice outside activities. Completely disappointed with the product as it's a very fragile watch. In less than a week of use glass was broken due to a very soft impact during an outside running. If you're looking for a watch to practice outside sports I would definitely not recommend it. I'm a fan of apple products and the product seems to work fine as a smart watch but not fit for sports purposes...Apple authorized services do not change the glass, you have to pay a high value, very close to a new watch to change your watch, totally unacceptable!

4/10/20 the watch arrived on schedule and in perfect condition. It’s an Apple Watch, so it was in its classic white box with apple logo and plastic seal, brand new. I have iPhone 11 Pro Max and it paired with ease in less than 10 minutes. I want to say less than five. I’m adding this detail because this is what scared me: I saw a review saying it took 30 minutes. I saw some reviews saying it didn’t even pair. Lucky for me, that didn’t happen. So far no complaints. I am loving my new watch. Will update with more deets. 4/15 battery life is legit, I get two days or more out of mine and that’s a serious upgrade because my old smart watch wouldn’t last a whole day. I love this thing! Buy it already!

review_title: A Huge Step Up from Fitbit HR
review_text: Love this watch - I enjoy receiving notifications of texts that come through - very handy.I also love the apps that I can access on my watch (and my iPhone)Love the slideshow feature.Next time I need a fitness tracker, I may step up another level to the 4, with its bigger face.I do wish that this watch would hold a charge for more than a day, but it recharges so quickly - I just like to always have it on me wrist....I tried this watch when my third fitbit in 4 years stopped working.I will never go back to Fitbit.

review_title: Better than expected! So many features and uses!
review_text: I love this watch! I am not usually a watch person but I had to try it. I can’t believe how comfortable and useful it is. I got it mostly for the health app. I have been tracking my work outs and steps but it comes in handy when I can’t find my phone (usually everyday lol). It also help me not have to pick up my phone every time I get a notification. I can set up only the most important notifications like calls and texts so I am not checking my phone all day. The Hey Siri helps me remember things when I can’t add it to my calendar or notes manually. I can’t say enough about how it has helped me.

I am absolutely obsessed with my Apple Watch. So many people told me that wasn’t a good investment, that I wouldn’t use it often, but I feel completely opposite of what they told me. I love being able to leave my phone in the bedroom to charge and the ability to be in my kitchen cooking dinner and responding to texts, Emails, and being able to see who’s calling me. There are so many features that I did not realize would come with the watch including the ability to use several apps. I would recommend this product to anybody who’s looking for a smart watch with many many capabilities.

review_title: Received 2 within a week neither would pair.....
review_text: Ordered one would not pair with either of our iphones, called Apple and they could not figure it out. Received the replacement same thing.......got my $$$$ back. Time to move on! Thinking that Amazon has a bad batch???Update: Ordered one from Walmart (same price 199.00) paired up fine!

review_title: Your going to break it and be sad.
review_text: So I love, love this watch. I love the app, I love it, however if you are alive and do anything wearing this watch you better wrap it in bubble wrap. I had this watch for 50 days- 50 DAYS! It is dead. I bought it to replace a fit bit for fitness tracking and was so happy with it and then the screen got cracked and then water got in it and then it was fried. I passed on Apple care thinking for 200 bucks if I get a year I will be happy. Besides even with Apple Care it would have been 50 bucks for AC and the another 80 bucks to replace/fix. I have loved Apple products but honestly after one to many cracked screens (iPhones) I’m done. I loved this watch. I’m sad it’s dead. I want another one, but i’m going to be strong.

review_title: A great substitute for the series 5 at a great price
review_text: I couldn't justify dropping money on a new series 5, which only has a few new features. The series 3 is perfect if you're on a budget, but still want the benefits of having an Apple watch.
Got it. Had it for an hour, and I was on apple support for 3 hours. I had to send it out because it was not pairing to my iphone, and I am super unsatisfied with this purchase.
Artículo corresponde a su descripción y llego en el tiempo esperado

Wanted an Apple Watch so much but didn’t want to spend the money for the 5.This is excellent.My friend has the 5 and so far mine does exactly the same as hers, guess it’s the fun yes we need. Watch is smaller and thicker, but I have small wrist so looks great. Bought multi color covers and mesh metal bands, so I can change up the look from working out to office.And price was best I found. Tracks my work outs, steps, elliptical, and sleep patterns .So happy I purchased!!

Works great I got this for my wife one because she loves apple and has an iPhone to go with it and two because she has leukemia and needed a fast easy way to keep track of her heart rate day and night step count ext she loves it and only takes it off to charge it last her about 2 days before needing to charge saying that she dose not play games or text on her watch so that helps with the battery life

Really love the features and appearance of this Apple Watch 3 series It is oneexcellent watch to have when you have a budget to spend on wishes.Well worth the money. Battery life is decent very smooth touch screen and advance software and beautiful hardware. All apps works so well. If thinking about spending the money on a smartwatch this is a must cop. It’s one lavish style on my wrist. Really loving it.

review_title: Battery life was a deal breaker
review_text: I really wanted to like this watch. The design is great. I also own many Apple products which I love. I read many reviews but not many ever spoke about the battery life. 18 hours is not long enough given my previous smart watch, Fitbit Versa, lasted 5+ days. Which did most of what the Apple Watch does. You cannot go on an overnight camping trip without charging it. Or any weekend getaway without bringing another charging cable. Minor but annoying. Most reviews said they charged it at night. However, I wanted to track my sleep and heart rate while I slept. If I wanted to track sleep I had to download yet another App and most of the time pay for it. Which leads to yet another app on my phone taking up space. Unfortunately I returned it. My first Apple product that was disappointing. I am more in the market for a fitness watch. An all in one as regards to the App. No extra apps on my phone to track things. Apple Watch seemed more like my phone on my wrist that took more space on my phone with the numerous apps I needed or wanted.

I really want to love my new apple watch, however, the steps aren't tracking correctly and I've done everything I've read and been told to do and still it's not working right.We went to Sea World and my daughter has a $40 watch and her steps were more accurate than my $200 watch!We walked all day long and I ended the day with around 550 steps and she had over 10,000 steps.At this point, I'm not sure what to do since my return window passed with Amazon.

review_title: Not using sleep tracking because it needs charge during the night.
review_text: It's not useful for sleep tracking if it doesn't have a good battery life. Unfortunately that's been my experience is that I end up charging this thing during the night so i can keep it going during the day. Also my dog loves sleeping on it. It might benefit from charging quicker? The mobile app is decent but there's room for improvement for how much I'm spending on it.

Since everyone knows Apple doesn’t really have any sales that often, I looked to 3rd party sellers such as Best Buy and amazon to see if I can get this for any less that the average price. And I was surprised because here on amazon they do have sales often!The watch itself turned out great, kind of what you should expect with an Apple product. Their ecosystem is pretty nice and this pairs perfectly and seemlessly to your iPhone. Make sure that if you are willing to buy an Apple Watch, you get it for more than just the time. It’s a luxury product and helps makes smaller tasks/notifications easier to manage and simpler at times. Great purchase.It also comes with a larger band inside as well!

I upgraded my classic watch to an apple watch and the experience has been totally amazing. Since I have a small wrist the Series 4 watch seems to big for it, but the 38mm Series 3 is totally perfect. I have a GPS enabled Series 3 and it is perfect with Siri, detecting movements and workout tracking. I totally love the white color as it can be paired with different band colors. Some people have a question that apple doesn’t sell 38mm bands anymore, but let me tell you that the 40mm bands go perfectly well with the 38mm series 3 watch. I charge my watch once in 2 days and it works perfectly fine. I totally love this purchase.

Got the 38mm series 3 Apple Watch. Love it! Perfect size. Battery life is really great. I don’t need to charge it every night but I usually do anyways. Set up was super easy and automatically synced up with my iPhone, then was able to choose which apps to put on the watch. So far I love it! I’ve heard from friends that this is the best Apple Watch out for the money (as of 09/2020). Highly recommend.
Product came and it is locked without someone else’s Apple ID. I cannot use the product at all.

I had bought one for myself last month after my husband received a smart watch as a gift. His was not an Apple and it had some nice features, but it would only hold a charge for about eight hours and he was getting frustrated. Also we swim every day and I am able to wear mine in the pool and he couldn’t. His birthday is in few weeks so I wanted to surprise him with an Apple Watch. He was very surprised and very happy.We both love our watches. We are in our seventies and had never had smart watches before now. It was a challenge setting them up but we did it!!

I was skeptical about buying an Apple Watch from Amazon but I am glad that I did. It was packaged just like it came from the apple store. The battery life is great. I am in love with my new watch. I waited a couple of months before completing a review.

review_title: Its what you don't know, that wastes your time and $$
review_text: I only turned the watch on and off and after reading the sparse written material that came with the watch (which was difficult to read becuase it is in grey color print, which is the worse print color to use as its really hard for older people to be able to see), it says you need to sync it with your iphone. I have an android, not an iphone. Otherwise you do not get all the features. Since I do not have an iphone I am returning the watch without ever using it. Wish somewhere in the descriptionit would be highlighted "Must have an iphone to use all features of this watch".If I had seen that, I would not have purchased it.

Another stellar product by apple. I have had other smart watches and they just don't work the way you think they should. This watch does everything I need it to do and more. It connects flawlessly with my other apple devices (iPhone, MacBook. etc). The band is very easy to put on and take off. The charging port is very easy to use with the magnet. Most importantly the activity tracker has already helped keep me motived to move more and do better with my health. I would recommend this smart watch to anyone.

Received a defective watch the touch screen did not work properly nor did the raise arm to speak feature.an agent setup up to have a replacement watch sent to me that was supposed be delivered today and pick up the defective watch I was told that the replacement watch was lost stolen while en route and the agent who I filed the initial claim with did not process a pick up correctly. I never seen such utter bad customer service.

Sure it tells time and you can change the watch faces, but the main draw was helping me with my fitness and for being a convenient method of using my phone without touching it.An entire day's worth of use only uses about 25 % of the charge, but perhaps it's because I don't stare at its screen all day.Makes it all the better that I didn't spend for the Series 5 as it would be doing just as little as the significantly cheaper Series 3.

review_title: short battery life but not horrible
review_text: I’ve had mine for a month and have almost no complaints. The battery life leaves something to be desired but not a big deal. Amazon said it wouldn’t arrive with a charger so I bought an additional one...turns out it came with one in the box so I have 2. Again, not a big deal, just a minor annoyance. Especially considering Apple loves to change the USBs so I can’t plug either charger into my laptop

review_title: Decent fitness tracker, better smart watch
review_text: Overall, it’s an okay fitness tracker. I chose it over the top Fitbit because this watch supported Audible and it was more of a smart watch.I like it for being able to take calls while exercising. It’s just okay from a battery life perspective. For sleep tracking, I still use my basic Fitbit.

review_title: Buy a Fitbit or a Samsung!
review_text: This thing is complete trash and will be sent back tomorrow! My Fitbit Alta never had problems tracking anything. According to this piece of junk I’m dead at night bc I have NO HEARTBEAT. I’m going to give Apple a shot and spend half my day at the Apple store bc their tech support has no clue why it’s not tracking sleep at all. Heart rate is every 30 mins at best during waking hours, battery has 24hours of life at the most. Worst purchase I’ve ever made!

I received my Apple Watch 38mm today. It came newly sealed in plastic still. I was so excited to open it and put it on right away. Calling from this thing is very clear and easy. Texting is also pretty easy. And it fits nicely. I can’t wait to use it for the active part of my life.

I bought the Apple Watch Series 3 for my daughter.She is so extremely happy with this thing.It looks great and works just as great.It was easy to set up and I think my daughter likes it better than anything else she has.The item was fairly priced right and shipped quickly.

This was a great buy on Prime Day! I got mine ordered and checked a few hours later and they were sold out! This is a brand new Series 3 Apple Watch. It comes in the Apple box and has everything except the adapter for the charging cable as others have noted. The charger has a USB connector and we have several Apple chargers so just used one of them. The watch charge is very good. I turn the display off and when I lift my arm to look at it. I think that helps. So many apps! I had a couple of gift cards so that made it even more of a good buy! Very satisfied!

review_title: Best Value for the Money for an Apple Watch !
review_text: If you want to give the Apple Watch a try to see if it will work for you, this is by far the best value for the money. I have the latest edition at 44mm as well and was thinking that this screen might be too small but surprisingly it is not! It is also very clear and easy to read .. my like my larger watch! So if the smaller version fits your wrist better, don't worry too much about the screen size in my experience / imo at least.

review_title: Keeping me on time and on track!
review_text: I finally broke down and bought the apple watch now that the Series 3 is down to $199 (just can't bring myself to spend much more than that!). I didn't expect to love it as much as I do. The battery lasts all day which is key. It's making me more aware of my activity and inspires me to meet my daily goals. I love getting texts and easily answering them from the watch. Years ago I had a fitbit that just counted steps - this watch wasn't much more expensive and it has so many more features.

I love this watch! My husband got me this for an anniversary and I’ve worn it every day since. I have a rapid heart beat so its nice to always know what my heart rate is at the exact moment and I feel that I exercise and try to reach my goals a lot more now too. It also tracks steps for Pokémon go, if you are a fellow player. I don’t wear it at night because I find it uncomfortable, but I keep it on all day and it gets the job done very well!

review_title: Buyer Beware... Not Compatible with iPhone 6
review_text: Received the watch and super excited to get it up and running. It has to pair with your iPhone to work. Ok, no big deal. WELL... it's not compatible with the iPhone 6 or earlier iPhone models. Apple says I have to buy a new iPhone if I want to use the watch. What?!? My iPhone is perfectly fine and I am not looking to upgrade before 5G model comes out. So my watch is currently useless unless I spend another $600 or more for a newer iPhone. There is no way around this.

I love these watches but if you do not buy a good cover for them they are easily cracked over the stupidest thing. This is my third watch and will be last. This time bought a good cover. Also battery life last about one day that’s it for me and I don’t even use it much but for time.

review_title: Would recommend Apple Watches for sure!
review_text: I love my watch. The sleep tracking never would work on mine but I have decided to charge it at night instead so it works out. I really love being able to see my texts & respond to them without my phone, I love being able to ping my phone when I don’t know where my phone is from my watch, I LOVE the workout & activity tracker, it helps keep me motivated to workout + move throughout the day. I love getting reminders on my watch from Siri that I have set & I love checking the weather real quick on my wrist. Over all, would seriously recommend. I was against the thought of them for a while because I spent so much money to purchase my phone, but it truly enhances my use of my phone & allows me to not be consumed by my phone. I love my Apple Watch!!!!! Everyone should get one if they are considering it. SO HELPFUL. Also, the space grey is so nice, never looks dirty.

As soon as you turn it on and get it close to your iPhone, it’s being pared (amazingly easy).Fully compatible with my iPhone 8.Good battery life (it lasts for two days and I am a heavy user).Great features of heart rate monitor and sports tracker.I liked it a lot until it fell ONE time and that was enough for the screen to crack :(In such an expensive device, I would expect to have a more durable screen that can absorb a short fall.

It was nice that this was priced well and was delivered the same day. However, upon opening the package I noticed it was packaged differently than how apple packages it. I also discovered the charger head was missing. Series 3 watches come with the charger head-this one does not. The USB cable is included though. After one day of wearing the watch, I noticed the battery drains really fast! I didn’t even use the watch-took it off the charging dock and set it on the nightstand and it dropped 25% battery life in the course of 2 hours!!!I am not super happy with this product.

Great watch, better price. After looking at all options available, series 3 is perfect and there is no need for a brand new and ridiculously priced watch. Packaging was pristine, arrived earlier than anticipated, and my watch looks and works beautifully. I have no complaints and I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Love it!!!! I finally had to upgrade from the Apple 1 due to the battery life and I am so happy I did! I love the workout sensor because half the time I get all excited and start running and forget to track it.I also like that it has the water lockout as well to allow me to swim with it. It is faster than my Apple 1 and looks really good.Great price for someone who doesn’t need the latest and greatest- Just something that works well.

review_title: 5 stars and my apologies to the seller!!
review_text: 5 stars for the seller. It arrived quickly and was genuine and brand new! I have an old phone though and it wouldn’t work so I had to send it back and that process was smooth as well!

I was always one to criticize the Apple Watch, that was until I finally got one for myself. My primary purpose for getting the watch was to help motivate myself to exercise more and keep myself on track and this watch has helped me do just that! I can track so many different forms of exercise and I love how I can pause workouts, track calories, and have the data also tracked on my phone. The watch also gives me reminders throughout the day to work towards completing my circles (the standing notifications DO get a little annoying when I'm doing work though, not gonna lie). I also love how I'm able to track my heartrate through my sleep and see my sleep patterns (do note that you will have to do this through a third party app). If you're on the fence about this watch, get it!!

Got hives around both wrists from the sport band. been trying to deal with Apple regarding this. I had to spend another $50 to buy a band that's nothing more than a piece of velcro with a Nike insignia on it.I want Apple to refund the cost of the original sport band which is $50 since It's useless to me.Went through an entire interview of questions regarding the reaction tothe band. I was asked to upload photos of the band and my reaction.Told I would get a call within 4 hours of uploading photos. That was 4 days ago.Endless time again today wasted on the phone and online chat to keep being told someone will call.They give a specific time too and no one does.$50 is all I asked for from a corp. that has billions.Done with Apple.Keep your products.I will not remain loyal to liars.

review_title: Battery life sucks, but it’s a good watch
review_text: So this is my first Apple Watch. I’m into body building and will be starting my bulking diet November 1st. I got it solely for the calorie tracker. Which I really like. I also like that if my phone is near, I can answer calls on my watch; and use speak to text. BUT the battery life does suck. However, being my first Apple Watch, I couldn’t bring myself to spend the money on the 6 series. For the money, I think it’s a good investment for someone who has never had one.

This watch is a must have for the new price, it wasn’t worth it at first because it was to expensive but now with cheaper price it’s a go getter.It’s comfortable and easy to use but I don’t need to explain no more it’s a Apple product most of them are good

*UPDATE* MUST HAVE . I’m inlove with this watch especially working in healthcare i no longer have to pull my phone out , it’s convenient , the health tracking apps are amazing . Glad I made this purchase ***Ordered Friday Received it today (Sunday) as stated . So far so good no damages to packaging , no damages to device , it’s brand new in box with everything included . Even an extra band . Only complaint is I received a black one when I ordered white . But that’s a simple fix by purchasing additional bands .I’m super excited to use it especially since I’ve always wanted to own a Apple Watch .The price was worth it !!!!!

So happy with this purchase!Especially for the price. I work in the plant and we’re not supposed to have her phones,this works perfect if my phone is put up I can still tell if I have a phone call or text messages from my sons sitter.I decided to purchase this when I missed a call from his sitter stating that she thought he broke his arm. I checked my phone later on and got a voicemail. So that’s when I decided I needed to get a smart watch And this one is perfect!

This is my first Apple Watch and didn’t want to start with the most recent so I started with the series 3 obviously. First off I love it. Set up was quick and easy. The watch came witha full charge. It took me some getting use to since it was my first watch but once you get the hang of it it’s smooth sailing. I will use this watch everyday. And FYI I wasn’t a person to wear watches but the series 3 is so comfortable I don’t even notice I’m wearing it.

review_title: Buy from apple directly or even best buy
review_text: Band does not securely lock anymore and it only has been worn for once month.Amazon customer service cannot do anything for me since I missed the return window. Only suggestion was to "kindly reach out to the manufacturer." Something like this should be PURCHASED FROM APPLE directly or maybe BUY FROM BEST BUY INSTEAD.I say this because at least they can provide more support than Amazon will for products like this.Amazon customer service is usually great... but not this time.

I put off getting the apple watch for a couple of years thinking it wouldn't be "all that". I recently bought the fitbit versa that was all the rage at Christmas. It was hailed as better than the apple watch by some. Obviously those people never had an apple watch. The fitbit quit on me after a month so I went ahead and got the apple series 3 watch.It is in a whole different league than the fitbit versa and I paid almost the same for the apple watch as the fitbit. This watch is amazing!

I think this is a great product. That package wasn’t damaged which was nice. The function of the watch if efficient and smooth. The set up took a few minutes which is fine, just be patient. I think it’s great. My only hiccup, is the battery life. Used it for a day and I was already done to 50%. I don’t want to blow that battery. But overall I’m very happy with it and how I’m able to mirror my phone with using the apps. I think it’s great! Highly recommend!!

I updated from the series 1 watch finally.I was gonna buy this item directly from Apple, but then I saw that Amazon had this on sale for Father's Day.I received my watch quickly.It was easy to set up and while the downside is waiting for it to update.Well I found other things to do for the half hour or so that it took.The battery lasts about 2 days of regular use.I tend to charge it in the mornings to about 70-80 percent and it'll last me till the next day no problem.

I hesitated but I really like this cool watch.It has different options for the face, stopwatch, timer, quiet vibes, tells me when to stand, move around, and breathe!Comfortable, etc. so what if it is spying on every move I make?

review_title: Neat, sleak and does what its supposed to
review_text: My only compalint about it is that it sometimes doenst sync up with phone regardign how many unread messages there are. I look at messages on phone and read them, but on the watch sometimes shows that they are still unread. WHich is annoying and i dont know how to fix. The watch itself works good and looks nice. I bought a metal band for it but only use the one it came with. It's alot more comfy.

Decided to upgrade from FitBit to Apple Watch and caught a great deal of the Apple Watch Series 3.I found it easy to set up and get to tracking. I did have to read up on how to use the buttons and all at first, but caught on easily.Love being able to access my Apps on the watch if the phone is not right by me.Got the smaller case, but it is still easy to ready and do things on.Just got it, so no ratings yet for the battery life, or water resistance.Still learning and playing around with the watch face and settings.

The battery last me about 2 days. It charges very quickly too. I wear it in the shower every day and it doesn’t cause any issues. Do take it off if you’re going to be in a dusty environment, I had to send my first one back after the microphone got filled with paint dust that I could not remove!!

review_title: sos far it has not given me any issues
review_text: So far it hasn't given me any issues. I like the size it is perfect for my wrist. It is sleek and elegant as is. I haven't had it for a long time so in terms of durability or technical issues, I haven't had any so far so i cant say.

I didn't need anything too fancy, just something to prevent me from having to take out my GIANT phone all the time. (especially at work) when someone texts me, I can simply look at my phone and get back to them.It's also compatible with other messager apps like facebook messenger and Discord. Also a great way to track your workouts!

I am SO Disappointed. I Purchased this watch thinking that it would at least last me for a year or maybe two. But the watch only has 4.8GB’s. And after just one software upgrade I no longer have enough room the the latest upgrade. I only had it for two months and it is already on the road to being obsolete.

Great watch, very comfortable and size was perfect.Have had fitbit blaze last two years and this apple watch takes the cake. It looks and feels like a nice watch, very happy with the purchase.Like others I was skeptical to purchase on Amazon but it came brand new, un-opened package and in apple packaging.I would highly recommend the purchase if your looking, you won’t be disappointed.

This Apple Watch was a gift to my wife and she loved it. It’s a perfect gift for anyone but the only thing I did not like is that charging takes a while and also activity option is little bit confusing. Otherwise, great watch.

review_title: Apple Watch 3 only compatible with iPhone 6s or later
review_text: My low rating is based on a woeful lack of information in the product specs. I bought the Apple Watch 3 and could not pair it with my iPhone 6 — because apparently, the new watch OS6 is only compatible with iPhone 6S and later. The specs and description do not say that. Only later did I see a mention of this deep in the Q&As. So now I have a watch in a box, until I can upgrade to a newer iPhone.

I think series 3 display is much better (sharp and cute) than newer ones.battery life is pretty good more than 2 days. magnetic charging is so easy.watch is not slow at all, display is so cute and vivid, not dim at all.all functions are just working nicely after updating os to the latest.always on display is not necessary because just one finger tip touch will wake up the watch.watch is a watch. it is not a ipad.don't spend extra $200 money if you are not necessary for the newest health feature over series 5.

Not sure why but it breaks out my wrists . I have to alternate wrists to keep them less irritated. For that much money it should be real silver .I do like most of the apps but not sure about the accuracy of the sleep and steps . Seems off to me .
I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. It is an amazing product and makes a terrific gift!

I loved this watch! I love it basically connected itself and I didn’t have to do much. Love I can have my own photo as watchface. I can answer calls make calls and text. Change music listen to music and lobe the wallow talkie function. Worth the money I’m very happy
As with just about anything Apple, it's a great product. I loved this watch so much but I upgraded.

I bought the series 3 Apple watch to replace a Fitbit Alta HR that just stopped working.When I received the Apple watch, it will not pair with my IPhone 6 because the software that's pre-loaded in the watch is further along than what's possible in the IPhone 6.While the watch is compatible with the 6, I either have to make an appointment at the nearest Apple store which is over an hour away and not available after 5 PM or mail in my brand new watch to Apple so they can set the software back where it needs to be to pair with my phone.It takes 3-5 days to receive the mail-in materials and another 3-5 days for them to repair it and who knows how long to send it back to me.I could have ordered a new Fitbit for less money and had it working today.I'm frustrated that Apple doesn't make even their own products compatible with each other and they force you to spend ridiculous amounts of money on the latest and "greatest" in order to use their products.
This item was illegally purchased by and sent to unknown persons at200 TOWN VWCANYON LAKE, TX 78133-6967

review_title: Watch out (pun intended) the description may be misleading
review_text: I purchased this as a Christmas present thinking it was loaded with watchOS 5 as listed in the description.Unfortunately, the watch will not pair with the iPhone 6+ that the recipient has, despite my checking beforehand.I guess the watch i got was loaded with watchOS 6 which dropped support for ios 12.Disappointing Christmas.Now I have a watch that won't pair with anything.

I wasn't sure whether to purchase the 38mm or the 42mm. It was a gift for my sister who has a fat wrist. The 38mm was a good fit, the bigger one probably would've been better as far as screen size. Regardless, the watch works great. What stands out the most to me is the capability of replying to messages through the watch. My sister is a college student taking many classes, and the watch allows her to send a quick text without using her phone. I recommend this watch for any college or high school student. The price can't be beaten!

When I got the watch in March and set it up work great. Notice in the third month the screen would go dark with no reason. I mainly wear my watch when I exercise and taking a swim. At the end of the third month, the watch blank out and the screen hazy (like when you watching a movie and it lose its signal). It came back on twice and then never came back on. Really disappointed since to send it back where I am in the Caribbean is too expensive. Hoping I can trade it in when I travel later this year to Canada!

review_title: Bought it on a whim and I love it
review_text: Bought the 38mm because I have a small wrist, and also separately purchased a scrunchie band from Amazon. I mainly use it so far for exercise tracking, but I love seeing my notifications on my watch. Privacy and battery life are great so far, charged it once, slept with it on, and it still had 30% before I went to bed the next night. Wouldn't recommend for people with poor eyesight, as the apps are small and I'm not sure if they can be made larger.

This watch is PERFECT I LOVE IT!!! I will be purchasing this again for my daughter. The box it came in was perfect. The watch itself has no blemishes it is in perfect condition. The watch apps work perfect. The charger works perfect. My watch lasted about 2 days on one charge!! I definitely recommend!

I am really happy with my purchase, I have been wanting an Apple watch for awhile and this was the best price I have seen for Series 3 in months! There was nothing wrong with it when I first received the product and it was easy to set up. Battery life could be better but I just put it on the charge before bed.

review_title: Love my Apple Watch, series 3 GPS only
review_text: I love my Apple Watch. It’s so convenient when driving or doing something that requires not using your cell phone. I am an in-home care giver and this watch makes communication with family so much easier while on the job & driving from house to house. Not to mention the battery life, seems to last literally all day and than some. I highly recommend. And somehow when my phone dies, it’ll still let me receive messages and stuff from it when I only have the GPS watch.. and I’m definitely not complaining about it lol.

My Apple 3 watch is fantastic compared to my Motorola 360 series 2 I’ve had for a few years. I didn’t realize till I got the Apple Watch just how poor the Motorola performed. I was never able to fully utilize all the functions due to the poor battery life, it was ever only good for about 8 to 10 hours on a charge.I’m able to use all the apps on my iPhone through my Apple Watch, I can use it all day and still have 83% battery life at bed time. And the The integration with my phone is just fantastic the way I can answer calls and send text and everything through the watch truly Amazing compared to the Motorola.

I’ve been on the fence with the Apple Watch for a very long time. I decided to pull the trigger because of the price. I don’t regret my purchase, but there’s not amazing about the watch. It is a very cool watch, but there isn’t a feature that impressed me. I used to have a basic Garmin, and it did a lot of the same features. Aside from the esthetics, and the pairing; the Apple Watch seems basic to me. Finally, the notifications are annoying.

Been wanting an apple watch for a very long time but didn't want to pay an outrageous price. with work i can't check my phone so i thought now would be the perfect time to take a chance &' get one. for the price, a brand new apple watch you can't beat it. i recently bought a band &' protective shell to go around cause the rubber band makes me sweat &' irritates my skin.Once i received it i was worried about scratches or maybe not even pairing to my phone cause you never know what can happen but it was perfect no problems whatsoever, took maybe 10 mins to pair &' it works great, it doesn't come with a wall adapter to the charger but i went &' bought one so i wasn't worried. very very happy with my purchase &' have no regrets. it's def must buy!

review_title: It's a change from Fitbit if you want live step counts
review_text: It's good for the basics but I'm sad that all the new watch faces are not available on this, only for the 5 model. However it's working fine for texting which is the main reason I switched from Fitbit.One thing I don't like about the AW vs Fitbit is you don't have a live count or HR on the clock face. You can click on it to update but it doesn't update every second like the Fitbit does.

review_title: Fast delivery . Feels better than series 4.Cheaper in amazon and Apple plus care availability.
review_text: It’s perfect ! I owned the series 4 before and it rusted out right after the year warranty . This watch feels more durable that the series four and I do not miss what ever extra feature was there - I think and ecg tracker . This was great but . If you go on coverage. apple.com you can purchase the Apple plus care if you don’t purchase the same time on amazon .I am very happy with this watch
Muy buen producto.Muy practico.

Love my Apple Watch, it’s everything you didn’t know you needed.So many different color and style bands are available to personalize the watch to your own style.Battery lasts about a day which is not as long as other watches, but if you think about it, we charge our phones every night...also takes less than an hour to fully charge.Also love the button to ping your phone when you lose it, very helpful.Super great watch, when this one breaks or dies, which I’m sure won’t be for a long while, I will be buying another one.

review_title: CAN NOT set up with CELLULAR providers
review_text: I didn't know this when purchased. Returned. I was hoping to see missed calls and new texts. You can NOT with this watch. I have iPhone 11 ProMax. ATT provider. So In bought another one thru ATT -- 5 series.

I still have my watch til this day... which is a year later! It still is working fine. I didn’t like it at first, but that was before I started going to the gym regularly. I’ve been using it like crazy and it helps me track my steps and everything. I would like to update to get a new watch but I don’t see a problem with this one tbh.

The sleep tracking I don’t really care about or have devoted anytime to. I’m sure you have to set it up. Other than that I love this watch. It’s like a little buddy and I don’t use it for much expect time or when I’m at work and can’t be on my phone. Other than that it’s a good buy and I’m happy

I absolutely love my Apple Watch 3rd gen!It has a nice sleek appearance, it works very well, it tracks my steps and notifies me of messages, calls, emails and etc...My only complaint would have to be the band that this watch comes with, it’s not the best for taking to work if you have an active job... I switched out the band and am much happier!

The battery life on the watch three is amazing! I usually use it from 7 am-11pm. And so far it just takes 30% off the full charge, I use it often so the battery is great. It picks up my voice to text easily and there is no delay.I do have a small wrist and I ordered the the 38mm one, and it takes up most of the space of my wrist, so it’s a perfect size.For the price compared to the newer ones it does what it’s supposed to do and I like it.I also love it since I cannot have my phone out at work, I am able to check messages and respond all from my wrist quickly.I definitely recommend for anyone thinking of purchasing one, it will change your life!

It is really nice.I think the battery life should be a little better but I understand that is what happens when apps are not closed.My friend doesn't mind charging it every couple of days.I got to play with the watch some and it is pretty great.Using it to answer his iPhone sounds pretty good too.

My Iwatch 2 got broken and I was looking for a new one. I was not about to spend the cost of a brand new one so I looked for a gen 3 and found this one. I love it, the watch works great and does more than the gen 2. I am not a fan of the new watch bands but that is something easily fixed with a few dollars.

Shipping was surprisingly fast and the watch came w the packing all sealed and everything. Series 3 is great for people who wants to have an Apple Watch but don’t mind about having the up to date one. It does basically everything that the series 5 do w small differences. Everything I need to do : track activities, weather and check messages is more than enough for me. I just think that batterie could be a little better. I basically have to charge in the end of the day every day.

I love this thing!! I’ve been doing research on the Apple Watch for years! Finally decided to get one. I will put it this way... I don’t need an Apple Watch, but I can’t imagine myself without one now! It tracks my heart which is wonderful because I have a heartmurmur, It’s counts steps,syncs with my workout apps on my iPhone, and it unlocks my Mac. I bought the generation behind because it can do just as much as the new one for a smaller price. I definitely recommend this!!
LOVE IT had no idea it came with a small/medium band and a medium/large band <U+0001F44C><U+0001F3FB>

I've been very happy with my Apple Watch! I mainly purchased it to help with tracking my exercise, and for quick communication/updates with text and email for work. It's been great in all needed aspects and more. I love how easy it is to use, the battery life is fantastic.

I BOUGHT THIS APPLE WATCH BECAUSE IT WAS GOING FOR A STEAL/GREAT PRICE.FIRST, I BOUGHT ONE FOR MYSELF BECAUSE I WANTED TO SEE IF THE APPLE WATCH WAS LEGIT AND 100% THEY WERE SO I ENDED BUYING MY MOTHER ONE. SHE LOVES IT. ALSO IF YOU’RE WONDERING BETWEEN THIS OR THE NEW SERIES 6, DEFINITELY SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUY THIS, THE FEATURES ON THE SERIES 6 IS NOT WORTH IT WHILE THE SERIES 3 IS STILL GREAT.

review_title: Deal of the day and what a deal it was!!
review_text: I am sooo happy with my purchase! I have been wanting an Apple Watch forever!! I receive Brads Deal alerts and I saw the deal for the watch and finally decided to treat myself and just get it! I absolutely LOVE IT!!! It is so easy to sync with your phone ! I was very impressed with how fast it syncs and how it is so easy to use! It has all the features of an I phone and more! Best deal ever!!!

Was fortunate enough to get this item with Black Friday pricing. Overall the watch is very useful for things such as time, weather, notifications, etc. I haven't had the chance to use it while working but can see how it will cut down on my phone utilization. If your regular watch is already around the same cost, might as well use this watch.Update: Used this watch daily for about 5 months now. I can say that is certainly has proved useful while at work. I am able to quickly and discretely check on any updates or information without using my phone. As someone who often cannot use their phone at work, this is extremely helpful and convenient. It has been great for quick replies to texts, checking stocks, activity level, etc.

I have loved the Apple Watch since its debut in 2015. But I could never bring myself to buy one. To me, it was like a really nice car. It looks really cool, but you don't need it. Then, it came to me. One day, as I was walking down the street in Downtown Boston, I realized that everybody I saw wearing an Apple Watch had a certain modern, tech savvy look about them. They were all very confident looking people. The watch made that person look intelligent. That is what made me purchasethis watch. And two years later, I still love it with my heart and soul.

Received this watch yesterday and tried to pair it with my phone but it kept saying that pairing failed. I called apple support and they informed me this particular watch had no software in it. Very unhappy. Getting a return started was such a headache. So please save yourself the headache and do not order this item!!!

I received my watch a few days ago.. Came a day early which I am pleased about.. I’m not a BIG fan of watches.. but I workout and using my phone was just annoying when I listened to music connected to my airpods.. had to carry it on my pockets when I go for walks, workouts..but now that I BOUGHT the iWatch.. I have no REGRETS..so far so good! The screen protector that I have on my watch, isn’t included in the box (just saying).. but it does come with a charger that 100%. works AND an extra band.. was gonna buy the 42mm but decided to see how the 38mm will be on me first! The 38mm fits very perfectly.. I have a small hand so I can imagine how the 42mm would look like if I wore it<U+0001F602> I’ll keep it at 5 stares for now.. I’ll come back to update on my comment.. but other than that the iWatch itself is amazing!

LOVEEEEE my watch! I haven’t had any issues with it at all and I wear it daily. I’ve worn it for 12+ hours at a time without it dying. Was in mint condition! Shipping took longer then it was supposed too so that was disappointing. I was leaving to go out of town and paid extra for it to be here before I left but it took longer to ship then it was supposed to. But very satisfied with the product itself.

Less than 90 days old and I already have issues. The microphone doesn’t work (tried all the suggested steps several tines) and now Minnie won’t talk. Love the other functions of this watch but wonder what stops working next.Update- Still having issues. The face popped off while wearing it. Upon researching, I found this is common in the earlier series. Also found that Apple is aware but typically doesn’t cover repair. Took it to Apple and nope, they don’t cover this known defect. Instead they charge 159 to repair. Not worth it.

I am very satisfied with this watch! I had the series 2 before and then got a series 5. but returned because the series 3 works just fine and half of the price of 5. It works very well for tracking exercise and also for calls.

I have an ipad pro, macbook pro, and an old iPhone so I mistakenly assumed the product would work considering how deep I already am as a customer.The device is a brick to the point you can't even access the main menu if you don't have a newer iphone. It won't let you go beyond set up without pairing. It does not let me sync my calendar or events or even connect to set up the watch from my ipad or mac. For a company that prides itself on it's "ecosystem" this is unforgivable. They expect you to pay over $500+ for a phone before you can even access to a $150-$400 standalone device it misleadingly markets itself as.Anything below a iphone 6s won't work further limiting this product's use. Why don't you allow users to access the base of your device and hide it behind a pay wall?Really disappointed and will be returning and looking at competitors.

This watch is the best purchase I’ve made all year. I used to have a FitBit but now I can’t imagine going back. This watch has so many other features than the FitBit and it’s also waterproof! $200 may seem like a lot of money but when you’re getting a watch that pretty much does everything a phone can do, it’s way worth it! (I would recommend getting a screen protector because I’ve hit it against a few things and it can easily be scratched.)

Don’t buy this!!!! Not accurate at all in anything. I’ll be sitting all day and it says my stand goal was met. I’ve been on the elliptical for 50 minutes as I type this and it says I’ve only done 7 minutes of exercise! I also have the ring on silent in the app, but my watch still rings loud in meetings. Wish I never bought this!!!!!!!! Pathetic.

I ordered me & my fiancé one! He works in landscaping & I’m a busy stay at home mom of 4 children. This watch is a life saver, I no longer have to have my phone in my hand when I’m busy cleaning, cooking etc. He loves his when he’s at work he can access what he needs without pulling his phone out. I also ordered the scene protectors & they are most definitely worth the money! The battery life is amazing but I did fully charge them when they came in before connecting to my phone. It’s literally all you need when you’re a busy person!

This purchase was for my daughter she is 14 and wanted one for her birthday. She has been very happy with it. It paired to her phone very easily we bought a screen protector to go on it to keep it looking great. The only thing that was a little disappointing is that even without a lot of use it sometimes can not make it through 24 hours without a charge so it makes it hard to track your sleep if you have to take it off to charge it. Now she just charges it while she showers if she wants to track her sleep.

bought this as my first apple watch.I am really enjoying it.I also use it a lot to track my runs and I don't think it is quite as accurate as a Garmin though.Plus I like the web interface for Garmin, but I am exporting to Strava via the Health Fit app I bought, so they have a nice web interface.In general I like all the features and am happy.

I've been eyeing my coworkers watch for over six months now, and finally decided to take the plunge. ZERO regrets. This has been so great at work. I can check my messages real quick and manage my phone without whipping out of my pocket. My screen usage even went down 60%. It's freeing!My only sadness is not getting the cellular version, but I still have my Iphone 5, so that wasn't an option unless i was going to upgrade that as well.
Not very tech savvy but love this! Great motivator to work on health and fitness! Can’t stop looking at my wrist. I’m horrible about misplacing my phone so the “ping” feature really help!
Please be aware that you cannot use the iPad with the iWatch. Other than that, it’s a solid item. Don’t skimp on the protective case.

review_title: After two month. I’m still wearing it.
review_text: Been wearing it all the time since I’ve own it for about 2 months. I did get a skin irritation initially which lasted for about 2 weeks, and later went away. The battery life last for about 12-14 hours with moderate use. I’m happy with my purchase. I’ve also used it to find my phone many time, read messages when I driving. The news bulletins are also quite useful, the Alarm I use on a weekly bases, it has a vibrating option that wakes me no problem. It durability is good also. I haven’t broken it’s face yet, but I do have to be more conscious about that since it’s not a rugged sports watch. I may buy a cover for it for extra ruggedness down the line.

easy set up, always told myself i would never get an apple watch because it was a waste of money and time... boy was i wrong! being a delivery driver i can’t always be on my phone so now everything is in a flick of the wrist! :)

review_title: Don’t think twice, buy this iWatch!!
review_text: I absolutely love this watch. I wear it everyday and would be lost without it. I am a full leg amputee and have long periods that I am home alone. This watch is my safety net. If “I’ve fallen and can’t get up”, I just press the button o the side say who I’d like to call and Siri calls them for me. The calls come in and go out very clearly. I have been extremely happy with this purchase!

I ordered my watch and was soo happy to receive it…until I looked In the box… and the only thing that was in there … wait for it was the mother freaking watch band and charger not both but only one . JUST ONE.

review_title: This is totally worth the money.
review_text: I love one fact about this. It honestly encourages me to move much more. Being able to SEE my activity is really motivating.Yes, I didn’t have to get this to JUST track my exercise. My daughter talked me into it.I’m looking forward to learning more about it!The pricing is amazing.I DO recommend a different band. The one that comes with it is very sweaty. You will get built up on it quickly.I ordered a few with holes all around it.

This watch is easy to set up and syncs seamlessly with I-Phones. I love the fact that it came in Apple packaging in case people are worried it's not legit. It is a great tracker of daily movement and I am able to receive text and calls from a pretty good distance away. I was considering a all functional watch, but this watch answers calls as well as long as your phone is in the same building. It connects well to Bluetooth headphones and you can even control music on your phone from your watch. The battery life is really good. I charge it every two days.

review_title: Pass the tone, the time will be.
review_text: This watch is my life! It is my partner in workouts. Reminds me to continue my impressive weekly performance. An app for every workout. I can text and talk, purchase w/Apple Pay, receive emails, check my heart rate and it looks great on. Oh and it tells time too!

After contemplating between purchasing a Fitbit and an Apple Watch for over a year I finally decided to cave and get this one, and I'm so so happy I did. I solely bought it for health/exercise purposes so after hearing there's not much difference between the series 3 & 4, I decided with the 3! I LOVE this watch. My favorite part about this watch is the Activity app; it really gets me excited about being productive throughout my day-- especially when there's friendly competition with my friends!

review_title: This is an awesome watch!No regrets!
review_text: There isn’t a built in sleep tracker, but even if there was, I charge mine at night.I currently have to charge it every other day for a few hours.It does however make my business life a whole lot easier with texting, calendar and phone calls on the fly.I would definitely buy again.I’ve had three other watches that couldn’t hold a flame to this one.

This is authentic Apple Watch 3 series. Came In original box and charger. I love this watch and use its features very much daily!! It helps me track my workouts, heartbeats, sleep cycles, sends voice texts and I can make phone calls through it, and check my emails!! I use all these features very much bc I have a busy life and find it so convenient especially when I’m driving to be hands free! The battery last me all day and it only takes about 1-2 hrs to charge :)

review_title: Great gift idea for my daughter
review_text: My daughter was soo happy and excited to receive the apple watch. It works perfect makes a great gift and she actually texts me right back now! She loves all the features.

I love my Apple Watch! It was new and perfect size for my small wrist, I got the 38 mm small so it was perfect. What I like about it is you can change the face of the watch and personalize it if you want, it sometimes doesn’t notify me of texts at work but I think it’s because my phone is too far from me at work, other than that it’s perfect.

review_title: The talk to text is so accurate!!!
review_text: I’m obsessed and absolutely love it! At first I thought notifications weren’t working properly but then I figured out its smart enough to know if your phone is close enough that you are using that so it only alerts the phone. Seems like your phone has to be at least a foot away. The talk to text on it is so much more accurate than on the iPhone. Super happy with it.

It's an apple watch, you get what you expect. I replaced my fitbit blaze with this and I think the only thing I don't like is the battery life is 2 days at best and it doesn't have sleep tracking. I had to download a free app for that. It does have some added features the fitbit did not have though, I was able to import my medical records plus you can talk on it and respond to text messages which is great when your phone is in the back of the house and you don't feel like running to get it.

I am such an apple fiend. literally i was very excited about this because it was such a good deal but i was scared because i didn’t know if this product would come with no problems but GOOD NEWS!! my order came in two days (with prime) and the box was sealed and the watch was BRAND NEW. i love my purchase.the only con with my apple watch is the battery life. you would definitely need to charge it daily which was a con because i had the fitbit versa lite and could go 3 days without charging. however, if you need full specs of the apple watch series 3, the apple website is your best bet but i would say purchase these because you get exactly what you pay for- brand new.

review_title: Upgrade from a 2 to a 3 - so worth it!
review_text: I upgraded from a 2 to a 3. So worth it. I immediately noticed the improved speed, the much better Bluetooth connection when jogging with wireless headphones, the altimeter function, and better battery life.

I was not sure I wanted an Apple Watch but decided to get one after my Fitbit stopped holding charges.It is super comfortable, easy to set up and although I am still learning all the features, I love the health tracking system!

I debated for a long time over whether or not to get an Apple Watch or get something on the cheaper side. I'm so so happy I decided to go with the Apple Watch. It's great at tracking my steps and my sleep. I didn't think I'd used the texting very often but I find it useful if I have to run to one side of the office to do a task and can't bring my phone. Staying connected at all times, is very important to me, especially since I have a family. The battery life isn't the best but I can get about a day and half worth of heavy usage out of the watch. If I don't play around on it too much, probably longer.

I never wanted a smart watch.Thought it was too much money and not necessary.My husband gave me one for Christmas a few years ago and I love it.I don't want to go back to just a watch any more.I love seeing my texts and calls without getting out the phone.Alarms and many other things are very useful with the watch.

review_title: Step down from Version 5 to Version3
review_text: I was giving an apple watch by my sons.When I needed to replace it I thought it was a version 3.When I received it it was smaller than my old one which I learned was a version 5.However, I love my 3, it does everything my 5 did and like the smaller version since my hands are small for a man.Apple Watches are the best!

review_title: How did I ever not have one?
review_text: Love this watch!! Got it when it was on sale around February and it’s the best thing ever. I always wear it during work and school. It’s comfortable, convenient, and the ultimate flex combo with AirPods. It’s also great for its GPS feature, sleep tracking features, and workout/activity features. I honestly can’t believe I lived without one for so long! Also shipping was fast, almost overnight. It came in the actual Apple Watch box with a charger included and everything works perfectly!
I CAN'T EVEN GET THE DAMN THING TO PAIR WITH MY PHONE.DEFINITELY GOT RIPPED OFF HERE.COMPLETELY WORTHLESS.

Purchased this as a gift, but didn't realize at the time that it was GPS only (not +Cell). Returned unopened.... We have another model of this watch and it's a great version.Sleep tracking on the apple watch isn't awesome because it's not a built in function of the watch (like it is in fitbit) but everything else is fantastic.

So disappointed in Apple. I bought this for my wife for Christmas. Hey phone is an iPhone 6. So a little old, but not that old. I double checked compatibility before purchasing. This watch with the latest updates is not compatible with her phone anymore. I'm so upset at Apple! Will likely purchase some other less expensive watch now that will work with her phone.

review_title: This watch only pairs with certain iphones
review_text: The Series 3 used to only require a 5s, since iOS 12 and watchOS 5 were a pair. Since new watches are now shipping with watchOS 6, they require a 6s since it and iOS 13 are a pair. It’s not possible to pair a Watch with watchOS 6 to something lower than iOS 13.This was a gift..and is now useless. Apple you should be ashamed.

review_title: Overall excellent except low battery life
review_text: I was pleasantly surprised to find an Apple Watch on Amazon but have no regrets so far! After comparing several models of fitness trackers, the watch just won out. It has done well with swimming, biking and running. My only complaint is the short battery life. I charge it overnight, workout int eh morning, and go to work and by lunch the battery is over 50% gone. Besides that, I have enjoyed all the other features!

review_title: It's a watch but so much more!!
review_text: There is a bit of a learning curve for me but my teenage is helping.It's nice how everything (phone, computer, Alexa....) links up and talks to each other so if my phone isn't right nearby, I can still be reached and reach out!!So many options of apps to try and it syncs to the ones already had!Wish I had caved and purchased sooner!

Great for about a month until the screen wouldn’t recognize any finger movements. I would try to unlock the watch but wasn’t able to type in the code. It was still receiving notifications but the screen showed that it was on 38% battery -it was fully charged- and the time was stuck on 7:42 even though it was three hours past that. If you do buy this product make sure to get apple care or else you’re just throwing your money away.

This watch stopped working completely after 6 months. There was no physical damage to the watch. Looks like a software/ OS issue. Tried doing a hard reset press by pressing the side button and digital crown at the same time for a few seconds- Apple logo shows up for a few seconds and then the screen goes blank. Didn't sign up for the Apple Care, so no chance of getting it replaced through Apple. And no help from Amazon on this as it's past the 1 month return window.

Honestly one of the best purchases I have ever made in my entire 22 years. Not only can you reply to texts from the watch, you can add apps that you use on your phone, and you can even control Bluetooth devices if you aren’t carrying your phone on you. I absolutely love the activity tracker as well. It’s so fun to personalize your watch too! Although I wish I bought the bigger size, I am still so happy with this purchase and it’s definitely worth the money!
He was beyond excited to get one. He got interested in it after he got me one for my birthday so I was nice and returned the favor <U+0001F60A>. Now we can battle for calories lol
Excelente producto y el envio llego antes de lo indicado, todo como nuevo y sellado en su caja! Recomendado!!

This was an EXCELLENT buy for at least $30 less than most sellers. I expected refurbished for the price but it was brand new. The differences between the series 3 and 5 were not enough for me to justify the big price difference & I am not disappointed. I have small wrist so I also found slimmer bands on amazon for only 8.99 making me love it even more.

review_title: Design flaw—doesn’t consistently mirror the iPhone.
review_text: The iwatch would only mirror the alarm on my iPhone inconsistently—usually not. Spent hours on phone with Apple, at Apple store. Store sent it out for repair and they were “not able to replicate” so sent it back to the store just out of time for me to return it to Amazon. There is a design flaw in this watch—don’t buy it and if you do, don’t expect AppleCare to cover the defect if it’s over their head.

review_title: Call - Text from your watch - very impressed.
review_text: I’m very impressed with this apple watch. Now I can answer my phone or see the text message using this watch. Receive calls. Make calls. Can set alarms using this watch and without having to pick up the phone. I also liked the Fitness tracking functionality. Overall, it’s a very good watch and I’m impressed with its functionality.

This was for my wife so the only thing i don't like is when she answers the calls thru the watch! I hate the tunnel effect and the delay. I feel like that should be the one thing that should work best overall the other functions!

Very pleased with my Apple watch.I gifted my last watch to my mom and got this one.Love the white band and the watch itself, too.The 38mm size is perfect for me and the apps do all I need for them to do.I highly recommend the apple watch to anyone trying to watch their health (sleep, steps, etc).It's a useful tool for that, but also to receive timely notifications, etc.
Impossible to pair it with my iphone!

I bought the watch to track my exercise. It also encourages you just to move more. So I'm moving more. I'm 76 years old with bad arthritis, so moving is not always something I want to do. But the watch breaks it down into small increments that even I can achieve. The watch works well, synced right into my iPhone. Nice to take care of phone calls without having to run to get my phone.

I'm wondering if I got a refurbished watch. I purchased this to replace a watch I lost. The battery life does not seem as long as my previous watch and the dial on the side sticks. My previous watches dial was very smooth. Makes me think this is a refurbished watch. I wish I'd bought one in person at the apple store

I don't like jewelry and was extremely hesitant as to whether I should've gotten it but I decided to give this a go for fitness tracking. I must say, it has changed the way I thought of jewelry. It feels very comfortable and it definitely is worth the price based on all the things you can achieve with this gadget, especially fitness-wise. Battery life is good, my watch can go two days without charging. It looks stylish yet comfortable. It gives you challenges as you progress on your fitness journey. Answer calls and texts from your wrist. It's versatile and can be worn with different wrist bands, from daytime to nighttime. This was definitely a good buy.

This is a product I didn’t know I needed until I got it for my birthday. I feel like Dick Tracy and Captain Kirk at the same time. I’m 55 so I think I’m so incredibly in awe over the technology that I can’t give a very thorough review. I teach water aerobics and it is completely waterproof. Yes, I’m fan girling over a watch.

The battery life is pretty good sometimes I won’t charge for two days and still going. I don’t wear it to sleep so I can’t say much about the sleep tracker. honestly I just use mine for the work out settings on it butI don’t see the point of having one but it is cool that you can answer calls on the watch that was a big plus for me

I’ve had my Apple Watch for a couple months now, and I can say it’s changed my life! I 100% recommend it to everyone! It definitely encourages me to be more active, and I love reading & replying to text messages on it. It has so many cool things about it- I can’t imagine not having one in my daily life! I was very happy with the price I paid for it buying this one on Amazon.

So overall I love the watch. I have had one before so I'm not surprised. The only problem I have (and I admit this is on me.) is that it is only blue tooth. I went to my cell phone carrier to try adding it to a plan and turned out that the version of the watch I got was not compatible. If i had known this i would not have gotten it but honestly i carry my phone with me everywhere so its not really a deal breaker. I wanted the cellular function as just a security blanket/ convince just incase I forgot my phone.
Perfect!!!!Came in new sealed packaging, with all the accessories.Broke my original and wanted to stick with the series 3.This was exactly what I was looking for.

review_title: Dont buy this watch for a fitness tracker!
review_text: I bought this watch after I fell and broke my fit bit watch. I have never been as disappointed in a Apple Product. It tracks me as exercising in my condo but not when I am biking outdoor with a heart rate of 150! It is absurd. What is even more absurd is the amount of time and setting changes I went though with support to fix the problem. I cannot believe a company that big would screw a consumer this way. Do yourself a favor. Do not buy this product for fitness. End of story!
It does not let me connect. I’ve been at it for more than 2 hours. I’ve literally searched up so many way to fix it and it just keeps doing the same thing <U+0001F644>

Ordered this for a great price and love it not a 5 or 6 but it works for me paired it up with a metal band and a protector that I ended up taking off because of moisture Other than the protector the watch paired up with the band love it watch is great and has had no problems what’s so everThank you

review_title: Surpisingly comfortable for someone who does't like to wear watches.
review_text: I had a Fitbit Charge 2 for a while that was good and served it's purpose but I still would take it off when I was home. The Apple Watch is surprisingly comfortable! Fitbit's app is still better than Apple's Fitness apps in terms of simplicity and ease of use but there are a lot of other apps that work well. Overall very happy with my purchase!

Like these as I own all apple products and was missing this. Got this for a thanksgiving deal. Worth the money as all the other companies charge close to $200. Like the activities rings . Battery lasts for upto 2 dats but can be increased with theatre mode when on trip

Bought this for my wife. Was excited when it arrived but after multiple tries it wouldn’t sync with my wife’s phone. Even tried my phone with no success. Called Apple support and still no luck. Amazon returns while seldom used was excellent as always!

review_title: Didn't know I needed it until I had it
review_text: Love this watch. The fitness tracking is great, sometimes it does short me a little bit if I'm on the treadmill 30 minutes and the watch only says 28. The band is super comfortable and the smaller face isn't too big on my tiny wrist. The messaging and calling from the watch works so well. Just love it.

review_title: DO NOT BUY PIECE OF JUNK
review_text: This product is a piece of crap!!! I have had this watch for one week and the screen popped off the first time put it on the waterproof mode. I didn't hit it or drop it or do anything to it that would cause the screen to pop off. Heck it was only my third time wearing it and the screen freakin popped off!
