I took it to apple and after hours of fighting they said that it would be $239 to fix it! The tec told me it was "strange for the screen to come off without cracking".This piece of crap device couldn't last one week being warn normally.So basically i am out $200 because i put my "waterproof watch" on its waterproof mode. I will never buy another apple product again and implore amazon to get this piece of garbage off their site!!!

review_title: This is legit a brand new watch.
review_text: OMG. This is legit a Brand New watch. Mine came exactly like you bought a brand new at the Apple Store. Everything is still wraped in plastic cover for $100 cheaper if buy at Apple Store. I also check serial number and it's brand new. Never been turned on. Still have all the warranty and everything like a brand new device. Get this deals quick guys. So so happy with my purchase.

This was a gift for my GF, she loves it. I took advantage of a heavy discount for the 42mm, I wish I bought 2 instead of 1.It's pretty fast and it has almost all the functions the series 4 does. The screen size on the 42mm is ideal, specially for those who has difficulty reading small letters.The series 4 is not a worthy upgrade unless you value the ECG and more screen area. Other than these 2 "features", you can have the same experience with the series 3 by almost half the price.
Absolutely love this watch. Had a Fitbit for 8 years . Made the switch and very happy for it. Don’t get me wrong Fitbit is great too but Apple Watch is awesome.
I received this as a gift from my husband.I love it and it has helped me to be more mindful of my activity levels and kept me from sitting so much.I couldn’t have received a better gift!

I literally couldn’t be happier with this product!!!! I gave a one star to the sleep tracking because honestly it’s terrible and any good sleep tracking app costs money. But that’s not what I bought it for and I don’t even use it! I love this product and I will continue to buy future apple watches when they actually improve on something!!!

review_title: You will need case and adapter to charge your watch.
review_text: I was a little hesitant about ordering this Apple Watch, only because there was some bad reviews. I am glad to say I LOVE MY NEW Apple Watch. I would recommend that anyone thinking of ordering get a shock-free case! Especially when you are not use to wearing an Apple Watch( you will be amazed at how many time you hit you wrist). It can perfect wrapped with an extra adjustable band and charger cord but the box didn’t contain the adapter pieces

Pros: has a lot more functions than other fitness watches.Cons: the battery needs to be charged basically daily.I had a Fitbit Blaze prior to this and while I liked it, it felt like a single purpose item. I opted for the series 3 over the 4 because the cost savings was so significant that I didn't feel I needed the ECG. I also do pre-paid cellular so the cellular watch wasn't an option (only post-paid and the big 3 are currently supported from my understanding).

I bought this as a gift for someone and this BRAND NEW watch isn't charging! I took it to iWorld and they said they will replace it because of the warranty (fair enough) but I have to wait 7 days for the replacement because they don't keep any stock of it! I don't purchase Apple products for myself so this was my first experience and I'm disappointed.

I have enjoyed my Apple Watch 3 Series. It has kept me active with the Monthly Challenges and the Special Edition Challenges. I’m able to compete with friends. Overall it is wonderful. However, there is a crack along the glass face of the watch and the glass has become detached. ( There have been other people who have had the same problem) That is disappointing since the watches are pricey and because I have only had it a little over a year. I have contacted Apple concerning this. I will give another update once my watch is repaired.

I like my new Apple Watch because I’m a very active person. I like to hace everything set on my watch. The only thing is the battery life, that I need to charge everyday. I though this product needed to charge just one day per week. But I’m general it’s a good product for the price.
Looked like the real deal, but I purchased my watch from the Apple store and it's been working for three years. Purchased this one for my gf and it stopped working after two months. That was a waste.

I just bought the Apple Watch 3 based on the posts that say it will work with iPhone 5s;however it will not pair, says I need an update even though my phone just updated last night to iOS 12.4.3 and says it is up to date.Is there anything I can do other than buy a newer phone?

review_title: a great watch on the go!
review_text: whenever you want to see time, weather, and mostly doing activity on the go, the apple watch 3 series is the best device for its job on the go. this watch can do lots of things as you do without picking up your phone when sitting down or doing something and it does the job right. in order to use the watch, you must pair it with your iphone in order to use it. but the process is very simple and fast since the updates and data doesn't require much memory. the price for this apple watch is a steal and it is worth it for yourself or as a gift for you family and love ones. 10/10 would recommend.

I purchased 2 and they work great. Battery life is pretty good as well. I get about 1 1/2 days off one charge. I’m up and moving a lot so it’s always counting something or going off so that’s actually pretty good battery life in my opinion. I don’t wear the bands I instantly installed some Velcro bands on them so it’s the perfect lightweight watch.

review_title: Beautiful Watch but make sure to get a case
review_text: First off the packaging was phenomenal brand new Apple Watch for a great discount! The only thing I really noticed was that the Apple Watch box was a little bit damaged probably from transit it was not a big deal at all. After I opened the box I removed the contents which were: instructions, an extra band size small to medium, a magnetic charger, and the Watch face with attached wrist band size medium to large. I also bought a screen protector and a case because I have been reading a lot of reviews that say the Watch face breaks very easily so I did not want to take my chances. I’m still waiting to get my phone repaired so I can complete the setup so I will make sure to keep you guys posted one I get it repaired.

Extremely happy about this amazon find!!! Apple almost never gives discounts so to get this at a discount was something we had to go for! It is sleek and the fit is great. I have used it for phone calls and the quality is great. The caller never has a hard time hearing me. Talk to text is also very easy to use. The pixels of the screen are great and very clear.

review_title: The Watch I didn't know I Needed
review_text: Well, I decided to treat myself to this watch and let me tell you now I know why people are praising it, I can't live with this after years of saying "I will never waste my money on that" You won't know you needed this watch until you get one.Battery last a long time and it just perfect.

Have had for a few months before reviewing. Battery goes for almost a week in a single charge which is much better than previous versions and the newest one. Very impressed. Usually review mtn bike stuff. Easy to use. Easy to set up. Good tracking on workout app. Updates are regularly every two weeks. Clarity during call is good. Siri clarity is pretty good. Definitely gonna recommend you people.

I got this as a intro my to smart watches, already having an iphone it seemed like a no brainer. At just under 200 bucks this thing rules. Activity and heart sensor features keep you more health conscious. App interactivity with your phone is seamless. Battery life is solid, if you're curious about smart watches and already have an iphone at this price point its worth a shot.

review_title: Very helpful even if it's not the newest Apple Watch.
review_text: I love my Apple Watch!! I was looking for a good deal in my price range that could do all I needed like track my exercise, etc. It can do all that and even more. I am blown away by all it can do especially since it is not the latest version. If you are looking into apple watches this is a good buy and the battery life is insane. I wear it all day everyday and when I charge it at night, there's still half a battery life left on it.

This product was phenomenal. To me it took kinda long but only because I was so eager. I’m fully satisfied and happy. When it arrived, the box was in mint condition & it felt like I bought it from the Apple store. Everything was in one piece and so clean. I messed up the box cause it got stuck with some glue from a tab I wasn’t supposed to take off but I was so angry, that’s how neat the box was. Kudos to the seller and success on any future sales!

I spent a long time being too cheap to buy an Apple Watch. Due to some health stuff i decided to suck it up and do it. With fitness app it makes your workout tracking easy. With the rings it makes it easy to see your activity for the day to see what you need to improve on.In another area, it has helped a ton at work. I work in a shop and it’s not always convenient to check my phone when i get notifications or calls. It’s easy to glance at the watch and see who’s calling or read the message. Super convenient.

I didn’t really know what to expect when I first got it, I really hoped I would like it because it has such a large price. It’s really made me think about how much I need to exercise.The Activity app rewards you for workouts you do with trophies on the activity page. There are apps that can remind you to drink water, take a moment to breathe and also count your sleep. It’s definitely motivated me to be more active and take care of myself.There’s also the super useful feature of being able to answer back to texts. You can either talk to your watch to do text-to-speech or you can draw letters out to form sentences. As well as text, you can call people using your watch and talk to them with no problems.Overall, a very nice product. If you’re lucky enough to get one at the price I got (26% off) that’s even better, but it would still be worth how much it costs had I not had that discount.

I bought this for my 23-year-old daughter and she loves it!!She uses it to track her daily activities along with texts and calls. It does a lot more than she gets out of it.She says her battery life is great and would probably last her several days although she does try to charge it almost every night.

I love that it tracks my steps, and reminds me to move a little bit at the end of each hour if I've been sitting at my desk.I have only one time been able to close the exercise ring even though I have several times done over 15,000 steps and it will show me as having done 7 minutes of exercise.

Love being notified of texts while busy at work so that I can look at later, etc. The sport app is fun and meeting my goals is helping me keep on my exercise track! I charge it every night and have no issues with battery life. Plan to get more bands to change the look. I am a physical therapist and love the timer on it! I got a deal on Amazon.

Bought this watch 8/21 new in box and when it arrived it would *not* pair with my iPhone 6s. I took it to the apple store and they were at least able to rule out that there wasn't anything wrong with my phone. They deemed the watch defective. Do *not* buy from Amazon, better off spending the extra 50$ to get directly from Apple.

review_title: Perfect for outdoor use like running & hiking!
review_text: I have had the watch for a few months and it is working as I expected it to work. I use it while running and hiking. I can upload my favorite songs without having to carry my phone. The only limitation is that you need to have apple music to upload songs on your watch. The battery life is good (not great unlike other apple products), I charge it once in every two days.
Love Apple and this beautiful watch!

review_title: Won't work with any prior models to iPhone 6s
review_text: My only issue was that this series is not compatible for iPhone 6. This watch won't sync to any older models previous than the iPhone 6s and after.

review_title: Thought it was a great product. Let down
review_text: Arrived quickly. Comes with a magnetic charger cable (no wall plug), two bands (1 S/M, 1 M/L) and all the instructions in the sealed box.UPDATE***Faulty band magnetic system. Watch bands demagnetize and fall randomly.I don’t if I just got some weird batch, but my bands keep coming off the watch randomly. They seem to get demagnetized and the watch just falls free. Shattered my screen and left my watch useless. Maybe it’s a weird batch?

Bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! He uses it mostly to track his steps and workouts and he says it does great! It does a lot more like answering calls, sending text messages, and lots more! We watched a few YouTube videos that show you the many features! Definitely worth it

I was debating between an Apple Watch series 5 and 3. Obviously got series 3 and I don’t regret it, has everything you need and you would not even notice the physical difference between 3 and 5. Totally recommend, great smart watch!

If you’ve been thinking about buying this for yourself but you haven’t because of the $$.... BUY IT! You definitely don’t need it. But you will be so excited about all the insanely cool features. You will also look very stylish with all the different bands you can get. You’ll get tons of compliments on it. Hop on the bandwagon.Seriously, talking to Siri is a breeze. I use the timer often (for workouts or cooking). Pinging your iPhone is a lifesaver. I could go on. This was a prize to myself for getting a new job and I don’t regret one cent! So happy with it!
This watch is everything you could want and then some. It’s worth the hype. It’s worth the money. It’s worth your time!I highly recommend this item.

My son received this for his 13th birthday and he loves it: using it for his alarms and reminders, texting with his friends, tracking his steps, and even *gasp* checking the time! Personally I don't have a need for one product to tell me to pay attention to another product but if you're a gizmo kind of person, it has its charm.

Product was pretty good for about 2 months. First time I got into water though messed it up completely and wouldn’t turn back on. Very frustrating to say the least and when buying on Amazon, you don’t get the best customer support when it breaks. If you are buying, I would HIGHLY suggest getting a waterproof case if you plan on getting into water. My watch was submerged for no more than 10 seconds at a time as I was in a pool.

Only got it a day ago, bought it because a colleague bought one. And some of the features are things I wanted likeHeart rate monitoring and emergency contact if you suffer a fall and don't move.Plus since an older model the price was more appealing. Setting up was amazing it practically sets itself up, never seen anything like it. Therefore, so far so good.

Love the gen 3 Apple Watch.It does everything it says it does well. The battery lasts throughout the whole day and helps me better keep track of my meetings and appointments. The display and functioning of the watch is beautiful and simple as well. Totally recommend.

review_title: Got this a few months ago and works great
review_text: I got this for my S.O. a few months ago hoping to save a little money by getting it on amazon rather than in store and so far it works great! It does not come with a charger so you'll have to buy that if you don't already have them but still in the long run cheaper and works well. He loves it!

Package came Monday they said it was going to be delivered the watch set up automatically once I turn the watch on it’s synced with my phone and I just added some information aside from that everything seems to be working wellAs far as battery life I just received it today so I will give or add another review soon

Works as expected.It's an apple watch. You're really checking Amazon for a review on this? Go watch a tech YouTuber or something!Has no native sleep tracking and you barely get through a full day anyway so can't really wear it to sleep.Worth it at the discounted price only.
Love this watch ! Only takes two hours to fully charge and lasted 3 days until next charge , I love how it tracks everything and helps keep you on track

Great product, only trouble I came across was, that it did not want to connect right away but after contacting Amazon and even taking it to the Apple store everyone helping came to a conclusion that it was just going through an update in order to fully connect. So dont panic if it doesnt connect right out the box. We still dont really know why this happend to my watch.

Got the 42mm on sale for Prime Day. Didn't see the need for the latest Apple Watch Series 4 and I still don't, even though you aren't able to get the curved complications on the watchface that the new Series 4 has. Oh well.Other than that, it's a great device. I use it to track workouts and biking. Easy to control music and to find my phone, which is often lost in my apartment.Battery life can run on the short side (I usually can get a full day out of it but if I forget to stop tracking a workout, I may only get about 75% of a day out of it).

I bought the Apple Watch to help with my weight loss goals. I’ve used the pre-installed Activity and Health apps synced with my iPhone to track exercise and the MyFitnessPal app (by UnderArmor) to track my calorie intact. Two months in and I’ve lost 12% of my body weight, well on the way towards reaching my target.Yes, the watch has a bunch of other neat features and apps, but it has exceeded my expectation in keeping me on track and motivated to loose weight and develop healthier habits.
Fast shipping, great value, and I love everything about itsaccessibilityfeatures except it does not read text messages like the phone doe. I am visually impaired and this is the very useful watch.

I ordered this product a month ago. I was pretty satisfied with it. It has to be charged daily so I was unimpressed with it’s battery life. However, my biggest complaint is that when dropped from less than 3 feet distance to the ground, the screen completely shattered. I can’t believe it. I’ve had iPhones for over ten years but this was my first (and last) watch purchase. I’ve dropped phones before from greater distances and never had a problem. Very disappointed!
Spent 2 hours at Apple Story to connect to watch.Had to buy an Apple XR Iphone to get it to function.

The watch was not what I expected. The connection between the 2 is not accurate.After 2.5 weeks I started having issues with the connectivity between both watch and phone. I have returned after 3 weeks.I was a bit disappointed about the watch since I have wanted it one for sometime.

Lesson learned! I bought this product and the very first and only time I go into the pool it died and won’t come on. It will just a little less than the actual cost to repair it. Take my advise, buy in a Apple store which would include warrantee and so you won’t end up like me!

Love the watch. But I was very upset it did not come w a charging cube. Has a charging cable but no cube.I had to go to the dollar store and buy one and what would u know it did not work. So I am now on the 3rd charging cube cause the cheap ones don’t work so well. You would think if ur spending over $200.00 on something it would come with a outlet charging cube.

review_title: Watch that helps me stay fit
review_text: I really enjoy having this watch! I am super excited about the tracking heart rate, calories, and syncs to my beach body on demand app. I do wish this watch would track the amount of sleep like my Fitbit did. It’s easy to use to connect to phone to write messages and take phone calls. . All in all, I am glad I got this when I upgraded instead of another Fitbit.
Easy to use once you get the hang of it & small enough to not get in the way with day to day activities. If can do so much. Great gift

So I had a series one and hated it. I only ordered this to be petty towards a coworker who thinks she’s the you know what for having an Apple Watch. I LOVE it! The battery life is perfect and lasts from 6 am until I put it on the charger around 11 or 12 (it’s above 20) and I use it frequently at work. The specs are amazing and it’s very simple to use. I suggest getting this one as it’s the same as series 5 only in smaller sizes and less colors.

review_title: Like it a lot more than I thought I would.
review_text: Kinda wished I would have bought one sooner. When smart watches came out I honestly thought they were stupid. I really only bought this for fitness tracking at the gym and throughout the day. I really like everything about it. If you are on the fence I suggest trying it out.

This is my second Apple watch series 3.I fell and cracked the screen on my first watch and the touch screen wouldn't work any more.Repair would have been almost as much as replacing the watch.So happy to have a fully functioning watch again--I use it for tracking steps everyday and for notifications.I even make and answer phone calls when I'm gardening--my WiFi reaches outside.

review_title: New? A dud, a lemon is what I got.
review_text: Brand new & it never worked. Talked with T-Mobil first, then Apple Support because I could never get a picture. Tried everything Apple said, didn’t work. Nothing else they could do. Called Amazon, their sending a new replacement. This was my 34th wedding anniversary gift. This lemon pisses me off.

I bought this on Prime Day to upgrade from my 38mm Series 1. I’ve only used it for a day but it’s an improvement over my old one. The face is a good size without being huge and ugly on a smaller wrist. Since this one is water resistant instead of just splash proof I’m no longer afraid to have it exposed on rainy days. It seems to be a bit better in terms of tracking my heart rate during a workout as well. Not as good as a Series 4, but it was half the price during Prime Day so I’m very happy with it.

review_title: Don’t know you need it until you have it
review_text: Just awesome! I was on the fence for a while about getting the Apple Watch. Co workers were saying how great it is and how you didn’t know you needed one until you have one. Mainly use for the fitness tracker. The use with the iPhone is seamless. If you are on the fence I say take the leap. It’s well worth it.
This does not pair with an iPhone 6 so I returned it. Such a scam because you have to get an upgraded phone which I don’t want. I’m fully content with my iPhone 6 it works just like the other ones.

review_title: Great watch for a couple years old
review_text: Im happy with this 3 series apple watch. Battery life is great. Connects to the app well.Tracks and monitors sleep, movement and more. Lots of wonderful features. Take it for a swim. Texting while your phone is close which is handy. Play music and much more.
The apple watch could not pair to any phone. We made phone calls to ensure that this was the case and told us to ship it back.Kinda disappointed.

Watch is great, came with two different size wrist bands and charging cable. I’m giving this one star though because it did not come with the wall plug-in part of the charger. I noticed a lot of people mentioned that, but it says in the description that it was included.It said in the description that there was a plug-in that the usb connected to. False advertisement. But the watch functions perfectly.

review_title: My Apple Watch is fun to wear.
review_text: I particularly like the activity mode.It keeps me moving, and it keeps track of my hiking.One thing I do find puzzling is that the mileage tracker is notmaking sense.Both my husband and I set our outdoor walk at exactly the same time, but when my husband and I take the exactly thesame hike,, my mileage is approximately 1/2-1/3 mile less than mY husband.My I phone does this, too.I like the ability to take phone calls on the watch, but I don't like the fact that I cant switch to my phone part way through a conversation so I can have privacy.I do have to take my phone off as I don't want to be awakened to"stand up."

Just bought this watch for my wife it won’t pair to her brand new iPhone X, Verizon local store has no idea why it won’t and now she has a take off work on a Friday And drive an hour and a half to the closest Apple Store to have it fixed!!! And this item was brand new out of the box!!

Have had two watches that the screen spontaneously broke on. This is supposed to be a known defect that apple will repair but they denied the claim on the first one. I haven't tried sending in the second one yet.

I bought this on the annual "Price" drop and I haven't regretted it yet! Out performs (obviously) the older watches and with the sale gave me a chance to up the size to the bigger version! It is a must have for those with slightly larger wrists so the pressure isn't so bad on the wrist/skin itself! Always get a case or screen protector!

DO NOT buy this watch. I received my watch on April 4, 2020 and it broke on June 6, 2020. I called Amazon and was told that the warranty expired on the watch on May 31, 2020 and because it broke 6 days past the warranty date Amazon will not be doing anything to help me. Apple is now sending me a box so that I can ship the watch off to get it fixed but Amazon was totally unwilling to offer a replacement. The watch is 2 months old and broke through absolutely no fault of my own (I was using the exercise app, the app froze, I forced a restart on the watch and it is permanently frozen on the apple loading screen) and yet they offered no remedy. Save your money and buy this somewhere else.
I love my Apple Watch! It works great, tracks my activity, can read my text messages from the screen and set daily goals. This watch is not on a cellular plan but works through Bluetooth. I love it!

I love this watch. Been wanting one for a while and finally pulled the trigger! I have a small wrist so went with the 38mm and it’s perfect! Gonna take a little while to figure out all the cool things it can do!

honestly, i feel the series 5 is just overhyped. i mean sure, the always on display could be nice, but this has all the essentials and then some. this watch has been amazing the past two weeks, and i got the space gray, 38mm variant, and i have discovered no problems. its great for the money, although i do recommend getting a new band, but thats just my opinion. i opted for a milanese band, since i dont really care for the sport band feel. however, dont get me wrong, the sport band is in great condition and shape. overall this product will serve you well for your time-telling activities and workouts!

review_title: Loving this series 3 smart watch in summer 2020
review_text: I was debating on getting a smart watch for some time now and finally decided it was time. I am pretty happy with my purchase. I was a bit skeptical about buying a series 3 in summer 2020 but this watch has everything I need. GPS, heart monitor, receive & make calls, text, exercise monitor, you can take pics off your phone and more. I appreciate the price point and the abilities it has. Shipping seemed rather quick for me too.
Bought used from Amazon warehouse won't charge anymore

My aunt had a series 1 and cracked the screen. My mother and I surprised her with this series 3 as a birthday gift, and it’s faster, more responsive, and water resistant. 3 features the series 1 didn’t have, but it’s more than enough a reason to upgrade.

My friend and I ordered this same watch at the same time. We also both had the iPhone 6. My watch would not connect to my phone but hers would. I called apple and they were very rude. I got mine a day after hers and he said there must have been an update on mine that hers didn't get. He basically called me a liar saying there was no way her watch connected to her phone. Long story short, I was getting a new phone anyway. The watch is AMAZING but they do not make that very small but important detail clear enough!!!

review_title: Great Product for an Active Lifestyle
review_text: The apple watch has been super convenient for my active life. Aside from work usage, the watch maximizes my ability to be as mobile as possible without having the need for my mobile phone to be around me all the time. This has definitely increased my phone life's longevity and user experience as I can leave it charging all day or use it when I like without the worry of battery life. Notifications of apps are pretty seamless as I get texts and other info I need to help facilitate daily work and life. Phone calls are much easier to take especially with air pods at the ready. Overall, a great compliment to those that live with iphones.
I was concerned about getting a series 3 when they’re on 5, but I am so happy with my purchase. Battery is better than expected, I love the 38mm size, and I’m really happy with all the features.

I enjoy the convenience of this watch, especially to use for working out and exercise tracking. It’s nice also to quickly be able to check texts when my phone is in another room. It helps reduce screen time because I’m not distracted by other apps when just checking a quick message.

My mom loves this so far. I got it for her for Christmas because the Garmin forerunner45 was irritating her her (and me). She was so impressed by all the features. Since she has an iphone i figured it would be easier for her to navigate it since shes familiar with the software. She says the battery dies quickly but thats all. She makes me want to get one.

This is a great deal for the watch.I've been researching for a while and am glad I found this offer.As far as the product itself, sleep tracking is non-existent (fitbit is really great with it).I do however love the reminder to stand and to breathe.

I absolutely love this watch! I tried Garmin but did not like the lack of functionality with an iPhone. I was originally not thrilled about charging my watch daily but I do it for my phone so when you put it in perspective, it’s small potatos. Would buy again. Also, it’s at a great price point.The only downfall to all of this was dealing with an Amazon refund. I sent the watch back because I had already had one. The return was started 25 June and here it is, 6 July and nothing from Amazon. This process is an utter disappointment. Get your returns in check, Amazon.

I've had my Apple Watch Series 3 for a week now and so far I'm quite happy with it. The only negative is it doesn't count steps - I was surprised because I was kind of expecting it. I did download Activity Tracker from the App Store to get this feature; was very easy to install and it works excellent except you cannot put it in the Watch Face to have it next to the time.
I love my Apple Watch. I use it mostly to track workouts, it’s slim and very accurate. I would buy this all over again!

Love it! Great size for my small wrist 38mmYou are in sync with your iPhone.Able to see your all’s, txt, email as well as reply from your watch. I can listen to my pandora, Apple Music etc. I strongly recommended it!”. Get it, you will love it!<U+2764><U+FE0F><U+2764><U+FE0F><U+2764><U+FE0F>

review_title: Love it but it doesn’t accurately track activity!
review_text: Love this watch! The only problems are after a week the battery life started to shorten and that it doesn’t accurately tract your exercise. I was really excited to see my activity stats bc I do high intensity workouts for about 45 minutes at least 3-4 days a week and it says I’ve only worked out 10 minutes.. If you run for 30 min it will be more accurate. I do really enjoy that it tells me to stand up or breathe (I have anxiety so when my heart rate increases it reminds me to breathe and it really helps). Overall, I love the watch and would definitely recommend but don’t take to heart if it says you haven’t reached your goals!

review_title: How did I ever do without?
review_text: I was on the fence about getting one of these, but now I love it. It has so many features and apps available it's amazing. The watch tells me when I should get off my fat butt and do something and awards me when I do. And hey...it even tells time.

I love it. It’s super easy to setup and I love all the different options. I got it for exercise but reading and responding to messages is huge. Battery can last about 2-2.5 days with no charge. I purposefully bought the 3 not 4 because I didn’t need the cell plan and I’m not missing anything! Also came in brand new box from apple (I know that worries some people).

review_title: One generation behind, still ages ahead!
review_text: It’s hard to know how much you need an Apple Watch until you get one. Then you suddenly find yourself more liberated from your phone, a feeling of freedom that comes with feeling connected without the burden of thinking and checking a device. If anything comes up, you feel if subtly on your wrist. I only use my Apple Watch as Notification Center basically and already so pleased with what it has contributed to daily work flow. I’m sure the more expensive series 4 Watch is great too, but at double the price one has to really think hard if the few extra functions make sense.

Love the watch, and all the features, BUT and it’s a big BUT, the battery life sucks! I’m on the move all day and can only charge my watch at night, meaning sleep tracking is unusable.I knew this going into it, the battery life is the only thing I miss about my Garmin Vivosmart HR.
Love it! But when I tried to add it on to my phone line they said it was a Wi-Fi only watch but I am really upset because I wouldn’t of got it from Amazon if I would’ve known that!

review_title: Great watch for first time watch owners
review_text: Really helped me get back active. I loved not pulling out my big phone whenever I had a notification, I just looked at my watch. I returned this item just because the series five came out and I want that one or the series four.

Was SO excited to order and receive this only to have gotten a defective product. The haptics/vibrate are nonexistent. Apple Support could not help with a hardware issue so I’m exchanging for a replacement. Its been really frustrating and the disappointment continues. It’s back ordered 2 weeks... plus I had put a screen protector on the defective watch. All in all, a big bummer <U+0001F61E>

I wear my watch everyday has was very impressed and happy with it. I mainly use it to track exercising and fitness. The watches face did have an issue about 6 months in. After a visit to the Apple store and waiting 2 weeks, I was sent a new watch.

review_title: Separate App Store for watch vs iPhone, can’t get most apps for watch
review_text: Battery life is not good if you’re using your watch for daily activity more than a couple hours a day. Not a lot of apps for apple watch, that really stinks

to be honest, i was hesitant about getting this product but my watch arrived in perfect condition with no scratches or any flaws on it! i searched hard to find an issue but it was impossible! it came with two different size bands so you could choose which fit you better. and it also came with the charger, however, it didn’t come with the box to hook the charger up to but come on, everyone has them laying around everywhere haha!

I was expecting more based on the reviews, but I’m kind of disappointed with the overall Apple Watch experience. Maybe I’m a minimalist, but I actually prefer my Fitbit Charge 3 over the Apple Watch. It’s not that comfortable, the battery life stinks and I mostly find the breathe and stand reminders annoying.

I was skeptical to buy this off of amazon but after reading the reviews I gave it a shot, I was not disappointed! Watch came packaged in brand new unopened box. I am still figuring out how to use it but so far I love it, easy to set up and link to your phone. 10/10 would recommend.

review_title: I’d recommend any version if the Apple Watch
review_text: Bought as a gift and they love it. They were using an Android based watch and this was a game changer for them.

This device replaced a first gen Apple Watch as I wanted to swim while wearing watch. Great decision. Price point was good, the watch functions far better than the previous watch and the battery life is incredible. I can often go 3 days before recharging!Very pleased with the watch.

I love my apple watch! I've had it for several months now, probably approaching a year, but I'm still learning about various features available on it! I love that I can use it for work (I work in the medical field), I love that I can set myself reminders, respond to texts. track my steps, record physical activity, etc! My only con is I wish the battery life on it was longer. I usually get about 2-3 days of use before it's time to recharge it, but that it a very mild complaint.

review_title: I should have stayed with FitBit
review_text: I am not happy with this product from Apple. The more I wear this product the more I dislike it for monitoring my activity and health. It gets away from the simplicity that Apple has made a hall mark of their products. I should have stayed with Fit Bit.
I love the app notifications - not just for texts emails, and calendar reminders. The Apple Maps integration is cool with vibrations each turn.

This watch is a perfect watch and phone combo that I do not necessarily need to purchase a phone plan with. I have it blue toothed to my phone and so when i am driving or out and about its perfect. I don't have to drag my phone in and out of pocket or purse overtime i need to use it.

I bought this used from Amazon Warehouse. I read some horror story reviews about the used products, but figured I’d chance it for the price considering I could return it within 30 days if I wasn’t happy with it. It arrived in the original packaging. The watch itself, although described as “very good”, was closer to “like new” condition. It didn’t have a scratch on it. All of the original cables and manuals were included as well as both the small and large size bands. I have smaller wrists, but my previous watch was a G Shock. Since I was used to a larger watch anyway I decided to go with the 42mm. I’ve had it for a little over 2 weeks now and I absolutely love it and have no complaints! Money well spent!

Perfect Apple Watch. The battery last for about two full days with using it during a workout. Easy to set up and love that it’s tracking my steps. Perfect for all the activities that I am doing. Works perfectly and the screen is clear and not blurry.

The shipping took a little bit but it was lost in the mail. The product looks brand new. It came with everything you would expect and it came with the plastic in every item. The box was sealed. The only complaint I really have is the box it was delivered in. It was too big of a box for this and was open on one end. It could have easily slid out. Other than that, it’s exactly as I expected!

The watch came without any issue. The battery is pretty good, no issues with the touch screen. All the tracking and notification work great. Easy to accept and hold calls. Thanks speakers work great. I really recommend this watch to anyone who's looking for a new smart watch.

I never thought I’d enjoy the texting from my watch (voice) but I’m really impressed with all the features that are tied in with the iPhone I was using the amazfit stratos until I decided that I wanted to try a Apple Watch it was a great decision if you are using a iPhone get this watch you won’t regret it

At first I was scared to buy an Apple Watch from Amazon but this one is perfect. Came shipped to me as if it was straight from Apple themselves. Got here quickly and works awesome (way faster than my series 1)

Only had this for a month, still learning about it all the time. My fav feature is the timers an alarm. I use those daily as a nurse. Makes me look efficient when I show up just as promised for a patient activity. So many cool things on this watch. Definitely a perfect purchase.

The Apple Watch Series 3 is an awesome device! The hardware and software work greatly together. There's not much of a difference between Series 3 and the latest Series 5, great value at half the cost of the 5. If you're into working out, this is a great buy. The watch looks great and works flawlessly.

Watch looks brand new just as you get it from Apple.Wife wears it everyday to the gym to keep track of hers steps and heart rates.She likes the watch but hates the fact that she has to charge it everyday.Overall saved about $30 through Amazon.

First let me say I’m a 5’11 male 320lbs with a 10in wrist and this watch fits easy with the large band that comes in the box as well as a smaller band for smaller folks. I am very pleased with this buy and recommend it to others and last my watch came brand new never opened.

review_title: Replace the Apple Watch band with a quality band. Be careful when putting on, do not drop the watch.
review_text: My first Apple Watch broke within the first 5 months. The watch band is not that easy to put on, it slipped while hooking the latch. The watch fell to the floor, the face shattered. No refund or credit or trade in. Useless !

review_title: Don’t recommend this product. Fitbit is better.
review_text: This is my first purchase of an Apple Watch and I’m not impressed. Like all things apple it doesn’t play nice with others and I have to reboot it every time for it to save my workouts. And it will sync but not save with my food tracker. It very delicate, doesn’t track sleep, and you have to charge it EVERY DAY and the charger that comes with it is not fast.

I am happy with what I bought. It says it is waterproof so I swam with it and then this is this weird noise on the crown when I turn it and it is even more laggy than before but still works. And also on the apple website you can get the exact same price for it on their website. But still Awesome buy, recommended!

I bought this after having a cheap $30 ‘smart watch’ to track my steps. I am obsessed with my Apple Watch Series 3!!!! One of the best things I have ever purchased. Works great with Spotify and Runkeeper, which was one of the main reasons I purchased the watch.
Love these bands Mary and expensive very comfortable I love the variety of colors. I have gotten several and change them out frequently because it’s so easy.

review_title: Got this as a gift for my wife
review_text: I got this watch as a gift for my wife as it checks all the boxes for what she needs in a smart watch. Well worth the value now for those who don't need the bells and whistles of a series 5. I would highly recommend it for anyone who needs a Wholesome gift for a super active person or someone who needs the convenient health monitoring features. Also, it was so convenient not having to buy this in Store. I have a friend from Australia who definitely gets props for suggesting this to me as a great birthday gift.

I love it. My mother kept talking about hers and ended up persuading me into getting one as well honestly I thought it was just another fad like it’s just another watch ok cool, but I kinda like it it’s pretty and I can track my exercise and walking accurately.
Love, Love this watch! I should of bought the 42mm one because i think the face looks smaller but I love the watch works so well!

Not sure why I waited so long to buy this. Very easy to set up and use. I did have to buy alternate bands because I have an allergy to the sports bands. Performs great while workingout. Great tracking while I run. Tracks my sleep. Great Apple product.

Bought this fir my husband for him to try out the waters on an Apple Watch (he’s a classic watch kinda guy), he loves it ! It’s simple enough that he can use it and he loves the activity tracking for fitness ! We only have to charge it every couple days so that’s a win too
My husband got me this for our wedding anniversary and I love it so much! I’m a busy stay at home mom and I always am bad for missing my notifications so this is a life saver!

I was on the fence about getting an apple watch but I love mine. Great for sleep tracking, workouts, step count, and getting notifications without being on your phone. I would recommend an apple watch to teachers or anyone in a field where being on your phone is not acceptable but wanting the security that you will not miss any important calls or text.

Only have it for a day but looks good and getting use to it. Would have been better if they would have included a manual or instructions on it instead of looking it up on internet and calling a friend several times to ask questions.

This watch was everything I dreamed of. I can do everything from this watch. Send and check messages, email, time, temp, etc....it arrived right on time came in brand new no scratches no scuffs. It was like I bought it at the apple store but for a lot less money lol. I’ve got absolutely no complaints abt this watch! Everything is just how I imagined it would be 5 stars across the board! This is the iwatch space gray 42 mm

Decided to take the leap and glad I did. Love the watch and app. Went with series 3 given price and happy with features and performance at less than half the cost of a series 5. Read the online comparisons and decide if the series 3 works for you.

I absolutely LOVE my Apple Watch. It’s great on for the go and I love that it tracks my activity and learns to push me when exercising. It’s funny how a watch actually motivates me to move more because I want to watch those rings close!

My son loves his watch. He has severe asthma and his watch saved him from getting worse. This watch has many amazing features and was offered at an affordable price. I am grateful I ordered it from Amazon. It arrived in a timely manner and it looked awesome once it made it to my house. It is worth the investment.

I will always love apple because of their amazing products. My Apple Watch has been a blessing for me. I've been way more active and been way more motivated to exercise more each day. I would say I was a pretty healthy person even before my Apple Watch, but my Apple Watch has allowed me to become the person I always wanted to be. The battery life is amazing. For me, one charge can last me a day and a half. All in all, the I would completely recommend getting this Apple Watch.

I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and for the price and the series model, it was a great buy. It came brand new, wrapped in plastic, and was easy to set up. Definitely might buy one for myself. It's been a couple months since I bought it and I haven't found anything wrong with it.
I was hesitate to buy such an expensive watch but I am so glad I did! I feel naked without it

review_title: Wish I would have bought sooner
review_text: I have been contemplating buying an Apple Watch for some time, but didn’t want to spend a ton of money.My friends talked me into getting a 3 for a less costly option with a lot of the same features.So happy with my purchase, wish I would have bought it sooner!

I love this watch! Its functions perfectly and charges in to time. Its sleek and not at all heavy, which I was worried about with the thick bands. It came with both S/M and M/L sized bands which was wonderful. Packaging was brand new and the device worked straight out of the box. Would definitely purchase again!

review_title: Don't waste your time shopping around for other smart watches!
review_text: I bought and returned something like four smart watches, not wanting to spend the money for an Apple watch.I wasted a lot of time doing that.I broke down and got an Apple watch and absolutely love it.If you have an iPhone, you really want to get an Apple watch to pair it with.It takes a lot to knock my socks off, and I am very pleased with this smart watch.

I just love my Apple Watch! Came on time. VERY easy to set up. It’s a super fun gadget and I’m so grateful I went for the series 3. In my budget and works great. I highly recommend. I use it mainly for fitness tracking. I am a wheelchair user and LOVE that I am able to put the watch in “wheelchair mode” to track and monitor my wheelchair pushes and fitness. Good job, Apple! It’s nice to have a reliable fitness tracker for wheelchair users! Bravo!

It is amazing especially because I bought it for such a good deal. Apple never disappoints, I absolutely love all their products. This watch send me notifications when I am unable to use my phone and it also keeps track of all my steps daily. The battery life on the watch lasts a long time I usually use it all day and at night I just charge it and it’s ready in the morning. The delivery time was faster than I expected.

review_title: With the generous discount, get this very cool Apple product now!
review_text: I am a Mac guy, and a registered Mac developer, so it would be expectedthat I would love this watch. I am getting more use out of this product than I expected. And the ‘coolness’ factor alone is worth it, especially with the $80 discount.

review_title: Buy it! The best deal for any apple product right now!
review_text: I’m siked! Never in a million years could you have convinced to buy an Apple Watch! But for the price I gave in! Y’all, this watch has GREAT quality. I’m not big on buying the latest on every product, but the series 3 is just as good as what they have out now , unless you’re very techno savvy and you need the latest updates! The delivery went great, it was delivered in 2 days, I do not have prime. Everything works like new! No glitches or scratches or anything fishy! Buy it! $180 .. you can’t beat that! I work in a warehouse and will be buying a case for it.

review_title: Can anything go wrong with an apple product? Love it!
review_text: It's an apple product after all! Can anything go wrong? I'm glad I bought it during the thanksgiving sale and gifted it to my S/O on her birthday. She loves it a lot and uses it to track everything except her sleep.It's a great motivator for her to do her excercises, so that's a plus!The battery life is not as great as compared to my galaxy watch, but still reatais charge for a good amount of activity time.

App is pretty user friendly and battery life is approximately 3-4 days which is pretty normal. I love the fact that I can see the clock and text messages very well even out in the direct sunlight. so far it has been a great purchase.
It is tricky to make sure that the product is original. Product came in a sealed pack and good packaging.

This is my third Apple watch and I really like them.. However, I have only had this watch for 2 months and the entire face of the watch is cracked and coming off. It is 10 days past my return date to Amazon. Now I get to go fight with Apple to try and try to get them to replace it. Very disappointing. Liz E

review_title: High schoolers will love this product.
review_text: I loved everything about this product. I am still in high school and a ton of my friends always ask me if they should get one. Honestly, yes. It makes it easier for me to stay connected without having to go on my phone. I can get message, email, twitter, instagram, etc. updates and notifications. I can call and text from it without having to get my phone. (as long as I’m connected to wifi) When I lose my phone, it is super easy to ping it and I find it right away. I love using it to track my fitness and setting goals works great.

This was a gift for my wife, as I already have one for myself. She loves it and wears it almost everyday. The watches have been very resilient. Never had any issues.On the negative side, they can get a little finicky when you upgrade your phone. I had to erase my watch and start new. This is not a big deal to me but was inconvenient for certain.

One of my best buys this year was this watch. It is incredibly sporty and cool in that it is extremely fashionable. You can wear one for any occasion (it helps that it has a wrist band that you can change out). It is very easily adjustable with sizing and with wrist band colors. Easy user friendliness as well. I'm personally not a sports person, but I find my apple watch INCREDIBLY useful. You can check text messages, missed calls, social media, etc. all from looking at your wrist. Overall, excellent product and much better than I expected.

review_title: Motivational with reminders to move and breathe
review_text: Hard to understand setting up to use. Didn’t know it would track sleeping

So far so good I have no complaints I actually brought my daughter the same one in black last year and she loves hers too...I thought I wasn’t going to like the white and even better when I found out I can change the case n band so I actually like it a lot<U+2764><U+FE0F>
I had been getting Fitbits.They always break within the year.I love the Apple Watch even though it is more expensive.It’s also completely waterproof.Fitbit would probably break if you sneezed on it

review_title: Great watch but read if you're on the edge
review_text: great watch not many things wron with it if you're thinking about a series 2 i would get this because of the stuff they added and how much better the 3 is but the 4 is much alike this one so dont spend the extra money on the 4Great watch

Had it only day but so far it’s actually what I expected. I really like how it mirrors my phone. I like the notifications on my watch.The face I can see at night without my glasses. Love it. The only thing I don’t like is the battery life.

I got this for my wife essentially to track her running milage. She is extremely happy with it and is accurate for running/walking and sleep. Reminds her to breath every now and then which I guess is life saving which I appreciate. She would buy this again and recommend.

I bought this watch during a one day flash sale. I've used a FitBit which I love, but they had too many technical issues. I took a chance on this watch and have had no problems in the three months I've owned it.It has more options than I need, but I really love the ones I use.

My husband loves this and he and my daughter-in-law have set theirs differently to suit their particular needs.He's had several fit-bits in the past.He likes this much more, especially the way it inter-phases with his phone.

I love my new Apple Watch! It’s so handy when I’m at work and don’t have the time to pull my phone out of my pocket. The only thing that’s not the greatest, is the rubber watch band it comes with. I have pretty small/thin wrists and it’s too tight for me to wear. I highly suggest buying your own band, but other than that... it’s incredible.

I love my Apple watch. I was skeptical at first when I was deciding to buy one just because I wasn't sure how often I would use it. Now that I have had a few weeks to break it in... I LOVE IT!!!I am a new mom and I hate that being on my phone a ton makes my baby want my phone all the time so being hands-free is crucial and convenient which is a huge factor when it came to picking between a fit bit and apple watch. I love that I can answer my phone while trying to change a diaper or make a bottle!! Everything else is great too but that is the best part for me :)

review_title: Works well for lap swimming (and everything else)!
review_text: I bought this item primarily to track lab swimming and it is wonderfully! I didn’t realize how much I would use it for other things. It’s really great for normal use of text messages, calling, etc. even without the cellular data. Love it.
Love and hate productDoesn’t update nor pair with my phone automatically I have to constantly manually do it.

Bought this for my wife who said she wasn’t sure she’d use an Apple Watch. Now she wears it everyday and has seen substantial value in having it from checking/sending messages, tracking runs, and the Wallis talkie function.

I highjacked the black band for home wear, and they’re so soft! You can tell that these were made with good quality. You can’t even tell you’re wearing them, they’re so soft and lightweight. Would recommend to anyone!

review_title: Great product, but battery won't go a whole two days
review_text: Battery life is less than expected.Some reviews had indicated it could go 2 days.I would say you can get a solid day and a half at most.I don't mind charging everyday, but I was a little disappointed in the short battery life.But hey, it goes about as far as my phone, so I can live with it.Love it!

review_title: Love the ease of not carrying a phone but it has to be near by
review_text: I use this for work and while walking. Do not use it for sleep have not tried yet. Can’t get to of at from phone as it will not jump on hotspot or WiFi so not sure what the deal is there. Great for workout and texting

I bought this to monitor my workouts, i thought it would be better than my trusted Fitbit. Pauses at least 15 times per workout while I’m strength training. I’ve looked up countless ways to fix this issue and after altering all of the settings and still having this problem, i saw an article that the heart rate can’t be read if my wrist is tattooed. Never had this problem with my Fitbit. Huge waste of money, also has to be charged every single day which is a real hassle

Very good watch the series 3 is a good budget watch and hold up to the series 4 and 5 don’t waste money if you don’t need to the 3 is a excellent option would highly recommend and will still be supported for the next 3 years.
I returned it but it seemed like one heck of a smart watch. buy it.

review_title: Essential if you like Apple products
review_text: I’ve had this for over a year and I love this thing.I like my iPhone and my iPad, so this thing is awesome.Works great and pairs easily to my phone.The most useful thing I have found is the contactless, Apple Pay function.Don’t have to take my wallet or phone out to buy stuff.So easy.

I was hesitant about buying online, but it was worth it. I love this watch and all of its capabilities. I had a versa and lived it too, but it got damaged and so I upgraded to this. This does so much and I feel like I hardly ever need my phone!

I bough this Apple Watch on May 2019 it been 6 months and is giving problems.. doesn’t alert me calls or text messages and lately Apple Watch was showing To update It which I did now since then every hr is asking me for a password in order to work even though showing the time on my watch <U+0001F621><U+0001F621>
My daughter love this watch beautiful and good price and came in the right time
Seems to work good. No problems. Has a cover over it so it has not broke the screen.
FIRST OFF I LOVE AMAZON BUT THIS WATCH IS DEFECTIVE AS HELL I LITERALLY BEEN TRYING TO PAIR THIS WATCH FOR 6hrsSTILL NOTHING IM SORRY BUT THIS WATCH IS POO POO

Got this as a gift for my girlfriend as she’s been wanting one for a while. I have a Series 3 as well but in black and I love it. The fitness apps are great, shows a lot of information on the watch and even more on the app on your phone. We haven’t had any issues and it’s such a convenience.

Was super excited to receive my Apple Watch but it didn’t come with a charger... I have never gotten an Apple product that didn’t come with one before so not pleased that I now need to pay extra for that
I’ve had for a few days now, I love it. It came brand new, easy to use! I wasn’t sure if these things were worth but it definitely is!

review_title: Great for every day use can last up to 2 and half days from a 100%
review_text: It’s a brand new Apple Watch works as need it’s not something that’s great to track sleeping with do to how thick it is and it can brake but the steps tracking great text back is goodnotifications great and heart ratesensoris little off but it’s a great device after all

Exactly the same thing you’d get from the Apple store without the hassle of lines and people! Amazing quality definitely get if you workout or are an athlete! I use it for swimming and sending messages mostly as well as Apple Pay! So many cool features!

review_title: Cheap and easy way to introduce yourself to a smart watch.
review_text: Fast shipping and product was brand new. This is my first smart watch and I thought I would buy this one just to try it out. I really like this watch and will definitely want to upgrade in the future.

Nice watch, really is water proof. I tested it in the shower got the watch really wet, I swiped up on the screen and hit the raindrop and twisted the crown and then dried it off. Works perfectly still. I like it.

Love my watch!! I’m not sure what the negative reviews where about, but mine came brand new and factory sealed! It paired perfectly to my phone and everything synced perfectly. I’m now updating it and it’s working smoothly! Best purchase ever!!*EDIT*Keeps asking for my passcode. Goes to different apps by itself and now it shows an Apple logo. I thought it was dead, but when I put it on the charger it still had half a charge left!! Very disappointed!!
After using a fit bit for so long and returning the 1st Apple Watch I got years back, I am so happy I made the switch!!

review_title: Gift, only complaint was battery life
review_text: Bought as gift. Came quality packed. Only complaint, if you can call it that, was that the battery life wasn’t what was expected. Not sure what the life is supposed to be but lasting all day seems acceptable to me. Great product either way.
Works great and connects to phone good. Only thing is battery don't last all day. Apple needs to update the battery life in these watches.
Ordered this for my sister's birthday present. The watch wouldn't even connect to her iPhone. We spent many hours at the Apple Store troubleshooting but they couldn't figure it out. STAY AWAY.

Watch won't pair with older iPhone 6.We called apple support and they stated that older iPhone 6 software updates weren't sufficient for newer Apple watch series 3.They became incompatible somewhere in the middle of the effective life of the iPhone 6, not at the onset of iPhone 6s or 7

review_title: Really worth the money and looking great and so helpful and so entertaining
review_text: Really worth the money and looking great and so helpful and so entertaining
My daughter loved it. And a hell of a lot less expensive then the apple site.

review_title: 38mm is the Perfect Size for Wife’s Wrist
review_text: iWatch as always knocks things out of the park. We originally purchased matching 42mm series1 but it was too big for the wife’s wrist, so I got her the 38mm Series 3 as an upgrade and she loves it.

Really like this watch. I got it to use mainly to monitor my exercise.I don’t really like wearing watches but the band is really soft and pretty comfortable.I had to watch YouTube videos of course to learn how to use it.

I bought this watch for my boyfriend for Christmas. He loved it! It works perfectly and is so useful! He also bought me the series 3 in silver and I love my watch! I never thought I would be an apple watch person but now that I have one it is great! We also purchased charging stations from amazon to charge our phone, airpods, and apple watch all at once and it is so nice!
I love this watch just as an awesome product I work with them every day

This watch came exactly as shown and is another high quality Apple product. I decided to get the Series 3 instead of the Series 4 to save some money and I am so glad that I did. It works flawlessly being paired to my phone and computer, Siri works great, and the battery actually lasts a few days if you turn it off at night. I'm beyond happy with this product and could not recommend it enough for anyone who doesn't need the latest, most expensive watch but still wants the Apple Watch experience.

Convenient and annoying simultaneously. Good eyesight and hearing a plus. The tactile notification is nice. Being able to glance at message subject matter without digging out the phone is great.Good first impression.

I thought that it was an apple watch with just a few features, but Apple surprised me! It has a ridiculous amount of features! It has amazing batter life, the apps are flawless (as usual), and every type of tracking is very accurate. I would highly recommend the Apple Watch 3. It may not be a 4, but it's definitely an Apple Product (fantastic quality with amazing features).

review_title: I got this watch so I could have music while running
review_text: I love this watch!!!Combined with my airpods, I've downloaded music to the watch and can go running without having to carry my phone or an ipod.A real game changer!!!

It’s not a iPhone, but it is a Stylish fitness tracker/notifications tracker. And it does it’s job perfectly. I recommend getting new bands to keep yourself different. There’s many nice ones on Etsy for $15. If you work out it’s great!! And if you are in the office it helps keep you off your phone and looking Professional.
Absolutely bang on your buck. It does what I wanted to do.

Love my Apple Watch! Connects very far away from my phone and I love the ease of texting without my phone as well as Apple Pay. Band fits very nicely and comes with multiple size bands. No need to buy from the apple store, came exactly the same from amazon

review_title: Nice to have but not necessary
review_text: Nice and comfortable. Hate the low battery life of a smart watch vs traditional watches. It last me only a day and a half. I also hate that it doesnt track sleep automatically. You have to download sleepwatch for that function! Otherwise it’s just ok, I don’t use it that much.

I’m so happy with this watch! I recently became an apple customer and I’m happy! This watch is very nice for the price I have no issues and was new nicely packaged I can keep track of my steps and much more

Was working perfect until today 6 months later. Turn it on and bam it’s a green static screen that won’t go away. Turned it off and back on... still nothing. Very disappointed.I’d like it fixed or replaced.
Amazon box arrive untampered, Apple Watch box end cut open - and is empty.NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER

review_title: Okay battery life. A good assortment of apps. Alarm is loud. It really motivates you to stay active
review_text: I love this watch. Battery life is decent as long as your not on a 2hr phone call using the watch. Couldn’t believe how well it helps me sleep by monitoring my sleep patterns and helped me make better sleeping choices. It also helps me stay moving and exercise more. And I couldn’t beat the price $80 off was an excellent deal.

review_title: When purchasing the item it gives wrong info; the item in not! compattable with all Iphones.
review_text: My son's iphone 6 does NOT work with that watch, so it's unusable. Ive returned the item about two weeks ago to Amazon, and haven't heard anything about refund yet. It is NOT in process.
Its fun to use the walkie feature but honestly aside from telling time its just a toy. Still its fun to have because i can look at alerts during meetings and it just looks like im checking the time.

Looooove! I had a 38mm that I managed to loose in the park. This time I got the 42mm what a difference! So much easier to use, see and hear. I’m 4’11” and pretty proportionate. It’s perfect and not to big or clunky.

review_title: Game changer for Apple iPhone lovers
review_text: Love the product it’s a game changer for Apple cell phone users. I’m kind of disappointed that it doesn’t come with sleep tracking technology. But after linking it with a sleep app it seems to be tracking very well. Also, kind of related it doesn’t sync with my Fitbit scale. You’ll need to top off the battery once a day if you plan to wear it all night for sleep tracking. Mine uses 50% with moderate use each day.

I love using the Apple Watch during workouts to keep myself accountable and also keep tabs on how many active calories I burn with each kind of workout. It's convenient to silently get text and call notifications as well since it helps me to not be on my phone as much. It's definitely an item of convenience that not everyone needs, but I got it mainly to keep track of my physical activity.

review_title: Very excellent like new Apple Watch
review_text: So far it’s been working great. All the features on the watch work nice. Just updated to the new watchOS and is faster than ever. Really recommend. I bought it as a reused and or refurbished product and it came like new.

Great products, work very well with IPHONE, easy to use, all the operation is intuitive, I use it to track my excercese everyday, and it can play songs while running, all in all, love this watch, love apple!
Great price and fast shipping, this will be a Christmas present so will not be able to see it in action until the 25

I just received mine and the packaging was just like the buying it from the store itself. I’m impressed and the price is so worth it. The battery has sustained itself so far, it lasts all day and charges quickly if you need a little recharge during the day. I do like to track my sleep so I’ll charge it for 30 minutes before sleeping and wear it while sleeping and use the Pillow app to track sleep. Overall this purchase was worth it and $80 less than the apple store!

Love this watch. Was worried at first because I thought that I would bump into something & kill it. I bought a watch bumper which gave me some peace of mind. Watch is spectacular. Why did I wait so long???

Really expensive watch. Tells time well. Features are somewhat tricky to use because it is small. Apps have very limited functionality in general. Only get this is you have an iPhone. It will be tough otherwise.

I just got mine this morning so I can’t say much about battery... but I do can say that I am in love with it. The 38mm is perfect for my small wrist (which I thought the opposite) and is really confortable. The way it let me to set move goals it helps a lottt. I will come back to review the battery life and other factors.

review_title: Love this Apple Watch! Glad I purchased
review_text: Bought this as Very Good from the Amazon Warehouse and it feels just like new. Haven't seen any cosmetic issues with it and it works perfectly fine. Been using it everyday and the battery life is great as well.

After a lot of research, decided to purchase the Apple Series 3 watch. Came delivered as indicated, new, in box with 2 bands, and charger.Initial setup very easy but needed my grandson to help me with more advanced settings, which was faster and easier than using YouTube!So far, love my purchase!

review_title: Great smart watch, OK exercise device
review_text: I have been using the iWatch for awhile. As a smart watch, there is no other watch that compares. As a workout device, it is lacking in easy of use. Yes, you can start, stop, and take splits but with not nearly the ease of the most basic sports watch.

I absolutely love my watch! I've been using it for a few months and it is absolutely perfect. I do wish I had gotten the one with cellular though! But I'm still really happy with mine and would recommend it to anyone!

review_title: Good if you know why you want it
review_text: I bought to track my activities since I’m very lazy. But if you don’t plan do use related to sports or exercises I don’t recommend.Battery can last up to 2 days if you don’t use several apps all the time

I have only had this for about 4 days and so far so good. I have had to charge it twice, once right out of the box and once again today. So far it seems to do everything I need and want it to do including motivate me to get up and move more.

review_title: Keeps nagging me to breathe but I like it anyway
review_text: I love this watch.I have come to expect that from Apple.Although it’s an older model, it does even more than I need.I do get tired of it nagging me to breath or stand up.I don’t wear at night so I don’t know about the sleep tracking
I love this watch. Always a huge fan and consumer of all things Apple. Artfully made. Very nice for either sex, though I feel this size is more “fitting on a feminine wrist”.

review_title: Great product and you need it
review_text: This was a treat myself purchase (Thanks Donna and Tom.. treat yo’self) and I honestly don’t know how I did life before this. I love the activity tracker and being able to do things from my watch. I’m trying to talk my husband into getting one for him too!

Bought it as a gift for my Wife.It isn’tthe most recent version and doesn’t have every option.What it does bring is exceptional value when compared to other newer models...and my Wife loves it!!!She gleefullyshares with me new things she’s learned about her device on a daily basis!!!
Very pleased with my purchase. Definitely more accurate than the Fitbit.

Dose everything I need it to do and for a great price especially if you don’t want to go for the latest series.Everything came wrapped and brand new and went beyond my expectations . I mainly use it for checking my phone notifications and replying to texts.The gps is amazing ! And the battery life lasted me all day from using the gps multiple times and doing other little things and it still had 50 percent left time I came home to throw it on the charger .
Why pay more, when the bluetooth version is all you need.

I got this instead of a replacement Fitbit because I was over the app instabilities and sync issues. It was time to explore a new option. I love the productivity aspect of this and I am much more on top of my life now with this. I have appointment reminders, email alerts, MS Teams alerts etc. The battery life is poor by design. Exercise tracking eats up the battery too. The time on charge is decent so minimal down time.

I recently upgraded from the 2 to this 3 and couldn’t be happier. This watch has great battery life and couldn’t be better in terms of motivating one to get the steps in! I love my new watch and have been a vocal advocate. I think it is overlooked for its age but it has an unbeatable price and compares well to other watch options.

review_title: The best deal ever for Apple Watch
review_text: Like overall Apple Watch, but this one I get as gift. Like Apple ecosystem and iPhone integration. Loves to use them, when my phone away of me but still near by. They plays podcasts without a phone at all, direct on your AirPods and always track your activity.

I'm digging it! I finally broke down and joined the rest of my family with one of these. I am budget conscious so I don't care to pay 500 bucks for a new fancy watch. I needed something to keep pace with my workout routines and this fits the bill. You'll be happy with this watch as I am. Good Luck

Nice Apple Watch for cheap, bought this for my birthday, on August 28th 2020, and still love it, perfect water removal system, water resistant, haven’t tried sleep tracking yet tho, so can’t tell you that, good touch screen, the screen is pretty durable, pretty much Good quality and good purchase!
I’ve been wanting an iWatch & this was the best price all around!

Very pleased to have chosen Series 3 when I had to replace my Series 1 Apple Watch -- and a renewed Series 3 at that! The battery lasts nigh unto forever, and like the Series 1, does everything I need (and MORE!) VERY satisfied and highly recommend!

I was a bit sketched out (which I’m sure was the intent) of comments saying it was used and/or missing stuff, but it actually came factory sealed and brand new. So that bit for me was fantastic and worth the buy.. would have been very dissatisfied if the watch was used. Battery can be good as long as you know what you are doing. Just be sure to turn off anything that runs in the background that you aren’t actively using all day such as the HeartRate Monitor (just turn it back on whenever you want to know that info).

review_title: Battery leaked battery acid on me after less than 4 months.
review_text: So disappointed. I've had it for less that 4 months and yesterday at work (I work a desk job) I was on a call and it broke and leaked battery acid on my wrist slightly burning me and making a mess! It's still running, but the battery is clearly corrupted and I can't wear it/use it now. I don't work out with it on or hang out it overly hot or cold places so it's never been over worked so it must have been a worn out battery before I even got it a few months ago.

review_title: So far so good! I Love it!
review_text: I was really debating whether or not I needed this watch. Truth is , I love it! I work with children and I can’t really be on my phone which makes this watch perfect for me! I purchased the 42mm , after reading many reviews that the face was too big, I still decided to try it. I compared it to my friends 38mm and the difference isn’t much !

review_title: Poor battery life and watch bands are both pretty short
review_text: I got this watch expecting it to be top notch, and don't get me wrong it doesn't suck. But overall, I would like to see longer lasting battery life. Also I have big wrists, and the biggest watch band it comes with barely fits around my wrist. Otherwise it is a great watch. I love all the features it comes with and I love that you can answer and speak on phone calls directly through the watch. Also love the texting features it offers. Other than my first two gripes/groans, no serious complaints. Watch is decent
Bought this for myself and I absolutely love it! Brand new in sealed box. Easy to set up.

review_title: Should Be Called a Dumb Watch
review_text: This watch can barely exist without a phone nearby to do anything outside of the usual. I get it that you can’t call someone if you don’t have WiFi, but how come Spotify won’t let you download music or Strava let you track your run without bringing the phone with you, the two features I was hoping to have for running. On top of that, charging the watch every night is a disservice, who has time for this!? I will say that the design is pretty cool but definitely not for everyone.

I can't believe I waited this long to have an apple watch - I love it - and at $199 its great value.The white band doesn't get dirty as I had feared, And I love all the features.My only complaint and question is why can't the Apple Watch track your sleep as well as a Fitbit?
We love our watches.This is the fourth one for a family member.It’s two generations old but it’s not missing anything we care about from the 5.Very happy with it.Very.

review_title: Nicely packaged, arrived in two days!
review_text: Came in Apple packaging, excited to see all the functions as I learn more. I feel like it’s 100% Apple product.
Awesome product. Would buy again!

I bought this because I was going back to work after maternity leave and can’t have phones out to be able to check on my baby...one of the best purchases I have ever made! Texts and picture messages right on my wrist! Plus it tracks my steps and some other cool stuff.
I haven’t had this thing for two months and it’s already gotten scratched. I’ve never had a watch or Fitbit scratch like this thing... sooooo disappointing, especially at this price point!

Just what I was looking for. I work where I can’t always pull my phone out and constantly check it. This is a perfect extension of my phone and I can quickly read messages and use Siri to respond. Battery life is the only downfall. Need to charge pretty much everyday.

Have worn this almost every day for 5 months! It is such a great tool to have with you at all times. I use it mainly for the fitness tracking and also checking phone calls and texts by just looking at my wrist.
