The Apple Watch was perfect. Everything came as it should. Watch is everything as described. Would buy again!

I did not have the watch six months and it overheated on the Apple charger and broke the screen. It no longer works. Piece of crap. Apple would not stand behind the watch so I am out of my money. Don’t buy it.
I’ve been using my Apple Watch for a while and I just love it! Delivery was super fast and it came perfectly!

review_title: Wish I could return it. Awkward to see the time or use any of its other functions.
review_text: Hate looking at my wrist and not seeing the time.Need to push a button to see the digital display. That means I need to use my other hand to see what time it is.Wish I could send it back.
Yet another amazing product from Apple. Tons of customisation. Only downside is the battery. Typical get about 16 hours use from new watch. This will degrade after a time.
I had a really good deal . I can’t be happier .

So easy to read the time - I am trying to learn how to use all the features, but the best thing is when I am walking with my phone in my purse and it rings - so does my watch and I can answer the call and talk on my watch. I love that feature.
This watch motivates me to workout ! Keeps track of steps , calories burned , workout minutes and more ! Love competing against friends and family as well.

Absolutely love my Apple Watch!! I wear it constantly and feel so much more in tune with my overall health. It tracks my sleep, calories burned, steps, and more. I would definitely recommend this item to anyone who is in the market for something like this.The only thing I’m not a huge fan of though, is the wet feeling after you wash your hands and water gets under the band. It feels like I got my sleeve wet. Would recommend making sure the watch band is completely dry after washing hands.
So far I love it. Way better than Fitbit .

I am a big fan of this watch and would recommend to anyone. The integration with iPhones is fantastic and, of course, easy to use. I don't think you have to worry about spending money on a newer version as this one works really well and is so much more affordable.

review_title: Get this! Cheaper than most apple products
review_text: This watch is great and links right up with my phone..it has all my apps and it is easy to use if you have an Iphone. Choose this one over the 5 its legit the same thing and cheaper.
Battery life decreased to about 6 hours after I bought it. I have done all the trouble shooting steps I can find. Love the watch, hate having to charge in the middle of the day.
So excited to get it.But couldn't pairing with my iPhone at all...Talked to Apple customer service and have to ship for repair... too bummer...

review_title: Just buy it. Stop over thinking it.
review_text: If you are still considering getting one, just do it! Great for people who are always on the go and need to continue to stay in the loop/up to date with things going on in their life. I am a college student so this thing helps me keep track of everything in my life between working at a hospital, clinical shifts, classes and tracks all my activities at work and during my actual work out. Batter life last all day and charges really fast!

I was a die hard Fitbit woman, but this Apple Watch goes above and beyond! I love all the features that synch up with my phone!I feel like this watch gets me up and moving way better than my Fitbit blaze did. I love being able to answer texts on it too! My three teenagers all want one now!

Love my Iwatch! I don’t know how I ever lived without it before! So convenient! You don’t have to worry about having your phone in the other room any calls or messages go right to your watch! It’s great for workout an giving you reminders! I wish I had gotten one sooner!

It’s more than a fashion statement. The functionality of the watch plays more than one role. I lose my phone and have the ability to ping for it to make a quick and easy find. I’m always updated with my current messages and who might be calling when my phone is not in hand. The fitness aspect is fun even though I’m not a gym buff. Overall this was a good investment of my money. Looking forward to upgrading in the future.

I was hesitant on buying this watch now I don’t know how I get by without it. I still can’t figure out the sleep Tracking option but that’s not a big deal to me. Being able to look at my watch rather than pull my phone out for text messages and calls has been invaluable

I bought this watch for my brothers birthday, he likes it very much and now is giving more time in studies and in fitness club. He is able to connect the gym's equipment for more accurate exercise. The heart rate sensor to save battery life is a good feature of this series, which is also great if you're going on a long run. The best thing of this Apple Watch Series 3 is that it is more affordable than Series 4.The time is not so far when smartwatch can replace a smartphone for most of the tasks.

This is my first iWatch and I loved it. Its luxury watch with great hard ware and software.I was very confused for size while purchasing so I am adding photos for comparison it might help you. I have small wrist 6.3” circumstances and I purchased 42 mm size it perfect on my wrist.Picture shows 40mm series 4(similar 38 mm series 3)vs 42mm series 3 watch.It one is great quality Apple product At Great price!
It was good while it lasted. Stopped working after exactly a year. Checked Google, apparently Series 3 backlight stops working. They were going to charge me almost as much as it cost to fix it.

I was kind of scared to get the apple watch off of Amazon but when the package got to my door step my heart went into my butt <U+0001F602><U+0001F602> as I’m un boxing the Apple Watch I see that everything was in the box and nothing was missing or broke <U+0001F44D><U+0001F3FD> I’ll keep you updated it’s only been a couple hours and I love it <U+0001F970>

review_title: Let me tell you what I love about Amazon
review_text: I originally purchased the Apple Watch in February.Within a few weeks, the microphone, dictation, talk to text feature, stopped working.I contacted Amazon and without hesitation, they sent a replacement watch.New one works great so far.Absolutely pleased with everything.I haven't tested the water resistance yet (honestly it scares me to get it wet) but battery life is great and it's easy to use.Love this watch.And love Amazon!

I love my apply watch, it came in in a timely manner, works wonderfully and super easy to set up. Literally everything I need is on it. My only complaint is I decided to do the rings thing, that tracks how much you exercise, your vitals and such, and the watch has made me keenly aware I am WAY more out of shape than previously though. If I knew I was that out of shape I wouldn’t have shared my circles with other people. I guess that’s more of a personal problem but still.All in all 9/10.
The 3 series is everything I need for activity tracking - very versatile.Easy to use and easy to charge.Works seamlessly with the app.(Oh, and it has a watch function.)

It's September 2020, about 7 months after I purchased and it's not holding the charge by 4pm. Even with a full night charge. Sometimes in tapping on the face it doesn't charge or it freezes :(I will not purchase a USED item ever. Very dissatisfied and sad...……….

I will update as I continue to use it. So far, it is very intuitive as it works with my iPhone X really well. I did my research before purchasing.My favorites:The breathe appFitness trackerNot being tied to my phone!Vibrations for notifications

I was very disappointed in this product. It continually reset and then after a few days it stopped working all together.I way not happy with the way amazon handle the problem. My advice would be not to purchase an apple produce from amazon, but instead buy local so you can get good customer service.
Such a powerful little watch and at a great price! Not the latest version, but still in the running. This is one of the few Apple products I didn't have. Super high quality like all Apple products!

review_title: Look brand new!! I’m so happy with it!!
review_text: I love it!! I was worried that I would be unhappy about flaws, but there are no cosmetic flaws at all!! And as of right now I haven’t noticed any issues,Or technical problems!! Very very happy with it!

I am now a Apple Watch user first ever only one I was a long time Fitbit on owner and now I am proud Apple I like the idea of having 24 photos of my kids and my partner and of our pets on my wrist and being able to do more with the watch of the Fitbit
Works swell, looks sleek, and great price.

I have no complaints on my watch.I bought it three months ago and i LOVE it. When i first purchased it, i was afraid that i would regret it, but i havnt, and would buy it again in a heart beat.|My favorite features include tracking my physical activity, find my phone, and the ability to text through it. I use them all the time. I also like that you are about to set up your phone and take the photo using my watch. Its very helpful.10/10 would recommend

review_title: BRAND NEW! Use the $50 Savings For Apple Care!
review_text: Brand new in box. Came in mail super quick. Great value, over $50 more for the same product at the Apple Store. DO NOT forget to buy Apple care!! Use the savings towards it. Thank me later!!
The watch tracks about everything.When paired with an iPhone you can even make calls on it.The speaker is just loud enough and a built in mic is a huge plus.

I have had this watch for over a year now! Still works amazing and holds battery for days! Although says water proof, after talking to staff at Apple store, they really don’t recommend putting any electronics in the water, so I have not submerged mine yet. Still love the Mickey and Minnie and toy story faces but would like to see more interactive faces become available from Apple please. Overall very satisfied!!

Wow I’m very glad that I bought this watch it’s worth every single Penny on it . Today I went to the Beach and I swim while I was wearing the watch with unlocks water mood. I was little bit worried if the watch turn off or something happened but just work perfect with swimming tracking . Happy happy with it .
I bought to a friend and she loves it!

review_title: No cellular can’t make/receive calls unless on WiFi
review_text: I didn’t know this didn’t have cellular service meaning I can’t make calls on it unless I’m on WiFi. If I attempt to answer call on my watch I can’t hear them. It’s good for fitness tracking I should’ve just bought a Fitbit

I have tiny wrists so normally I have a hard time finding bands that fit. This band has been amazing! Going on two months and I have no desire to switch it out. I use it for work and the gym and it has been very comfortable and holds up extremely well! Would definitely purchase again.

I’ve been loving my watch. The battery lasts longer than my day, and it charges in only an hour. Looks great and has so many great features. Download an app for sleep, and it shows you your sleep patterns.

I end up charging it every other day, but I'm not a hardcore user.I don't use it for music or to talk to people.I mainly use it for notifications which it works well with.I was surprised as how nicely it integrated apps on the phone.I have an authenticator app on my phone and I just need to touch my watch to approve access to vpn.It's nice.

review_title: So good I had to get another one
review_text: I got one guy my daughters 18th birthday and it was so nice I got a second one for myself! With the price, both were still cheaper than the newest model and we love them!!

I've really liked this item.It allows me to track my activity during the day and helps me stay active and healthy.I'm able to see my messages without pulling out my phone or even answering my phone.I was hesitant at first to getting this watch but am so happy I got it.
Perfect . Need I say more . The white band is fresh. The silver case is dope. And the quality is dumb ditty dumb super fly . You gotta get one foo

review_title: Bought for my gf's birthday. SHE LOVED IT
review_text: Amazing qualityRuns perfectlyNo flawsNo lagsNo scratches
Not a great deal.Overly complex and so don’t like having to manually tell the device I have started my workout.Heart rate monitoring is cool.I like it, it is just not as intuitive as I would expect.
So happy with it! This is my second Apple Watch. I had first generation that lasted me 5 years. This has nifty added features. Love it. Great price. Thank you.

Purchased this because it was much cheaper than buying it from the apple store. When I got it, everything looks legit and it works just fine. I decided to buy apple care from the apple store; however, it would not let me because it did not qualify. Luckily four days later I went back and it qualified (not sure why but hey I'm not complaining) and spent $49 for apple care.Recommend this to anyone who does not want to spend the extra money on the apple store!

review_title: Good prices and new apple watch with original packaging
review_text: new and good prices..I am using Samsung Galaxy and apple watch can't be used together..when ordered apple watch I really forgot they can't be used together.very funny...sometimes it's happened when we saw the good prices,so now I just orderediPhone xs and will delivery soon..I hope they can be good together..
I use to have a series 1 and it got stolen, so this is an upgrade for me, I love the watch no issues and can’t wait to use it more! :)

I love this watch! First off the price on amazon was unbeatable but besides that it’s so useful to me because I’m a hairstylist and I don’t have time to be looking at my phone but Incase I get an important text or call I can easily see it on my wrist! Love love love

The watch does what it says and more!! I have always had a Fitbit and was wondering if I was wasting money buying an apple watch, but for what and how often I use my watch, IT'S GREAT!! When you start a workout, the watch automatically tracks it!! If you are or want to be active, I highly recommend investing in a watch like this!!

review_title: Hubby loves it for exercise tracking
review_text: Bought this as a gift for my hubby so he could keep up with his workouts.He absolutely loves it.It keeps him encouraged to keep moving.As a diabetic this is important for him.
Bought this watch for my husband as he destroyed his other one after several years. It was a great price and glad amazon had it as most places were sold out.
I bought this watch for my wife. It is being sold at a great price right now. Although not the newest model, it has plenty of features for my wife to enjoy.
Not what I expected from an Apple Watch but good
The product will not pair. Don’t buy this junk. I spent an hour on the phone with apple and they could not get it to pair either.
Don’t know what I’d do with out it is so great. Love the walkie-talkie function!
Love using the watch to track sleep, time of exercise etc!
I should have just gotten one of these, rather than waste my money on the previous 2 fitbits.

This watch is amazing I use it everyday but it is easy to scratch so I got a case [2 Packs] Simpeak Screen Protector Cover Case for Apple Watch 38mm, All Around Soft TPU Clear Touch Screen Protector Bumper Cover Case for 38mm Apple Watch Series 2,Series 3, Clear + Plated BlackAmazon'sChoicefor "apple watch 38mm cover"

Alright so I gave this a 4 star because... When I got the watch it wouldn’t want to connect to my phone or anyone else’s phone so I took it to Apple and they need to fix it up so I paid for shipping and I got a broken watch but I know I’m gonna love it when it gets fix. I was really excited to get it but it wasn’t working right<U+0001F614>

This is nice, just got it yesterday. I usually don’t have any trouble with Apple products but for some reason it was difficult to get my notifications to come through on the watch. Other then that I expect typical battery and longevity of any Apple product.

Integrates well with my iPhone. Battery life sucks. No gps. Relies heavily on iPhone to navigate. Phone mic sucks. Honestly a huge disappointment after having the Garmin Instinct. I’m probably going to throw this in the closet and reorder the Garmin Instinct because even though it doesn’t have a color screen it’s ten times the watch this Apple Watch is. Sorry Apple but you’ve really dropped the ball in too many areas in the smart watch world.

This is a great Apple Watch. I had my series 1 since it first came out. I wasn’t planning on getting another one since mine worked great....until it didn’t. This is a great upgrade without costing a fortune.

I originally got this watch to do the walkie talkie with my friends. I like that you can walkie talkie anyone of your friends no matter where you or they are. It’s nice not to have your phone with you and still be able to answer calls or texts.

I'm loving my watch i've been swimming with it which is the main reason for my purchase. It helps aid my breathing when I'm stressed tells me my pulse rate. It even tells me when i'm not as active. i just love it. The band is comfortable the fit was perfect. The only thing i have to do now is purchase a fancy band to wear it when I'm out at events

I love this watch, I had the other series and there was nothing wrong with it, other than the battery life didn't last long.I decided to get this one because they were reduced and I wanted to upgrade to the next series.
Order and received this and it was immediately defective. These are not updated and apple will tell you to send it in for multiple weeks.

review_title: Happy I made the switch to Apple Watch
review_text: I was a Fitbit user for years and years, and finally made the switch. I was afraid it would be complicated, compared to the Fitbit, but it’s easy to figure out, and has way more features. The only downside is the sleep tracking.

review_title: Skeptical at first but pleasantly surprised :)
review_text: Came with Apple Watch, charger, small and large bands, and original box. Great condition no scratches , so far works great! The only bad thing was the box had minor scratches.

Absolutely love my Apple Watch! I debated between getting the series 3 or series 5 and in the end I decided to go with series 3 to save money. I love that it comes in the 38mm size because I have really small wrists so anything larger would be too big for my wrist. I’m excited to use this!!

I never thought I’d want an Apple Watch but you truly don’t know how great having one is until you experience it yourself. I love all the features. It’s stylish and modern. The watch itself is super light weight. Highly recommend getting one!
Got this as a gift for my fiancé and he uses it constantly - great for all the apps that sync with his I-phone, step counting, finding his phone when he misplaces it etc.

Extremely pleased with my purchase. The price is awesome and 2 day shipping made it even better. This is my 2nd watch, I cracked my screen on the first one and really missed having a Apple Watch. Very happy with my purchase!

I love my watch. It’s taken me a few days to get it all figured out.A con though, I went to the app to look at an exercise I did and saw four exercises from October 2018 (I bought the watch last week.). So basically I think I got a refurbished watch sold at the retail price. I’m not too happy about that but it works fine so I guess that’s a good thing.

review_title: I can’t believe I waited so long to get this watch!!
review_text: I love this Apple Watch!! It really helps me track my exercise and steps throughout the day! Apps can be set up on it as well so I can check weather, music, and more!

review_title: Small cute and does a lot.
review_text: Like the fact that it ad a smaller face had a larger one but lost it. It does everything my other watch did, haven’t found any fault with it as yet.

I love my apple watch because I'm able to answer and view texts. Unfortunately the battery life of an apple watch is not as long as a fitbit. Overall, I do prefer my apple watch because it can do more than a fitbit.
it works great! only complain is it only works with iphone! not even ipad...(

My dad has only been using it for a week. Now it doesn’t even charge and we can’t even exchange it. Such an expensive piece and it can’t be used. If I knew it wasn’t going to work, I would rather just buy one new and spent a little more. DO NOT BUY!

The optional long section of the band will not lock into the watch.The shorter section of the band will lock.But the optional larger band section will not lock into the watch no matter what is tried.Called Apple and they will not support.

so far so good. wonderful condition. this was simple to pair with my iphone, only took 30 mins for me & it’s functioning well. you get to customize the apps and settings by using your watch app on your iphone, which makes things easier. it came charged up too:) *disclaimer* i haven’t had the apple watch for more than a day now, i’ll update my review if anything changes.

I love this watch. It tracks everything perfectly. The battery life is great, I do charge it every night when I’m asleep. I love that you can call and text off the watch. It’s fast and so easy to use!

review_title: Just what I was looking for
review_text: The light from the watch when I moved would wake me up in the night. Easy fix. I take the watch off at night to charge, so battery life is never a problem.Love that I can change the band out. Works with my phone. Would recommend.

review_title: Wont pair with a new phone
review_text: I tried to pair it with my iPhone, which is up to date in its software, and it wouldn't connect because the series 3 watch did not have its software up to date. Had to send to apple. I wont have my watch for a couple of weeks.
This was a Christmas gift. It arrived as scheduled with no issues.

This watch is perfect if you need a smart watch and also on a budget!! It fits perfect, my iPhone downloaded and set up the watch within 2 minutes, the text is readable and not to mention the sleek packaging it comes in. I would definitely recommend buying this product.
Very Impressed, watch arrived within 2 days, brand new in apple box. So top marks to seller for sending a brand new product as expected. Works great you can’t ask for better
good
Bought for my daughter. She loves it. Brand new with box and accessories. Some reviews stated they received a used one with no box. Never had a problem with anything I’ve bought from amazon.
Was skeptical buying this watch for the price. But when it got here I was pleasantly surprised. And it’s still holding up months later

review_title: Very excited to get this watch
review_text: So far this watch has been fun. I have had it for a month now and feel like I am just breaking into the potential. The activity tracking has been a good boost to be active. Only time will tell if I take advantage of it. Typical Apple watch, but I thought the price was good and the series 3 did all I needed. I scratched the screen pretty easily, so I have put one of the gel screens on to protect from such.
Bought my wife this Apple Watch. A lady at work was trying to big time her with a Fitbit so I decided to back my hunny. Worth the money. It shuts up workplace bullies and has a calculator.

review_title: This is the best thing ever!
review_text: I got the series 3 apple watch about 3 months ago and thanks to it's motivational notifications and the ability to track my workouts and heart rate I have lost 10 pounds! I have the weather, Time and date on my watch face and it is super discrete to receive notifications during a meeting. I recommend an apple watch to anyone who has an apple phone and wants to be healthier.
Bought this as a Christmas gift Because I loved mine so much. It is a beautiful watch perfect for tracking your daily activities and managing many things from your smartphone!

A very good well built smartwatch for iPhone can only be manufactured by apple itself. I have used Fitbit, Amazfit, Samsung gear sport for apple iPhone, whereas this watch satisfies me and I recommend ONLY apple watch to sync with iPhone. One bad experience I had is with delivery. My delivery date got cancelled twice and got this finally.

This series 3 apple 42 mm watch works perfect and i have had no problems with it at all. Very easy to set up using the apple watch app on the iphone. The speaker and the microphone both sound great. The price on Amazon was very good. I would recommend this Apple Series 3 42 mm Watch. It works so good i am fixing to order another one for my wife.

Love everything about this watch.I had the Series 1 before and it was easy to transition to the Series 3.Love that it is waterproof.I don't have to worry about it getting wet if I jump in the shower or pool with it.

My main concern was the packaging and whether or not someone could tell what was in it due to fear of it being stolen. It was protected with bubble wrap. No damages at all. It came exactly at the time it was estimated to be delivered. Perfect

review_title: Perfect Apple watch for a woman!
review_text: Wife is over the moon thrilled with this watch and I am jealous given my series 1 watch has less features then she now has. She loves all the motion/fitness features and the easy of use.

I bought this item and my charger stopped working within a month and I am trying to contact the seller and it is making me go through apple. I have been on hold with apple for over an hour when it is said I will be helped in less than 10 minutes. Now I can't use my apple watch because I can't contact apple in order to get my charger. Amazon should have a way of sending me a new charger since I bought it through amazon so that I don't have to go to apple support.

I bought this for my boyfriend because he really wanted an Apple Watch after seeing mine. I have a Series 1, and this Series 3 is a hugeeee upgrade over mine. It's so much faster, and the bigger screen is much nicer to look at. I may need to upgrade my watch too!
Better than the FitBit it replaces for every thing except sleep tracking.I wear mine every day and have yet to scratch it.Needs about an hour daily to charge fully.
Love the long battery life.It seems to have increased sensitivity to steps, heart rate and sleep. Perfect upgrade without the huge expense <U+2764><U+FE0F>

I love my Apple Watch.It has done everything I wanted and more.I love that you can receive and reply to texts on it and that I can find my iPhone when I misplace it.It’s a great addition to my Apple family.

Perfectly tracks my running with the Nike run app. Other than that I only use it as a watch, and in that capacity it works well.GPS tracking works good even away from the phone, which is good because I like to empty my pockets before a run. Bought a second for my wife when it was on prime day sale. I’ve worn it daily for at least 6 months and had no problems whatsoever. Battery lasts more than 2 days which is fine because the longest I’m ever away from it’s charger is around that.

review_title: Still must have if you are an iPhone user
review_text: Sleep tracking is not included. Battery life is for one day. But still a very useful watch. I bought a used one for my wife and she is happy with it.
What else is there to say, Apple's products are superior!

I was looking into the Fitbit Versa for over a year as I thought buying an Apple Watch would be way out of my price range. During the bloc Friday sales the watch was $20 more than the sales price of a Versa and well worth it.The Versa is not compatible to answer calls or receiving notifications from your iPhone.Of course the Apple Watch does and it even vibrates on my wrist for the reminders from my phone which is a tremendous help!!!
I bought this as a gift, my brother loves the gift! Would purchase again!
I don't know anything about apple products. Bought the watch for my 16 yr old. She loves it and said everything checked out. I literally ordered on Friday and received on Sunday!Super fast shipping.

I bought this for my wife for her birthday. She now wears it pretty much at all times and tracks her steps, her sleep, uses apps. I can't wear a watch to work or I would totally buy a second one for myself.

review_title: It’s great, but it’s not fantastic.
review_text: I’m honestly a little disappointed that there seems to be no changes to the watch from the first series, which is what I had before, but well that’s fine, the watch does a lot of fun things and I enjoy it. The main thing that annoys me is pretty arbitrary: Apple seriously needs more watch faces!! A corporation of this size and capability should be able to produce more than 110 faces (and some of these are the same just different colors)!

I really love this for keeping track of my workouts and health and for this to only be about 2 years old, the price was awesome! The new ones are cool but there’s not a HUGE difference between this and the series 4 except the price. As a college student, I’d recommend it especially if you’re already in the Apple ecosystem and want to keep track of things like health and having little alerts without always being on your phone.
I got my watch yesterday and it’s not updated and I can’t pair my phone to update it and you can’t update it without pairing it
I love it. I upgraded from the first gen and I won’t look back.
Absolutely love this watch!!! Best investment!!!!

Came in perfect condition, looked like I just purchased it from the apple store. Still wear it and use it everyday. It goes with every outfit and is water resistant so I don’t have to worry about taking it off.
I was a little hesitant because I did not know much about these watches. I gotta tell y’all that this is GOLD standard. This watch is amazing. So happy I decided to purchase one.

The product failed after three weeks. We now have to journey to an Apple Store for them to potentially fix it or send it away.This was an expensive gift for my daughter's graduation. The whole celebration has now been marred.Waste of everyone's time.

This is my first Apple Watch. I’ve had Fitbits prior to this purchase. Overall, I’ve been pleased with this Apple Watch. The only negative comment I have is that the battery life is about 3 days, whereas my Fitbit lasted 5-7 days. It does come with a magnetic charger, which is definitely easier than trying to connect some of the Fitbit chargers.

review_title: Be careful this Apple Watch will not work with iPhone 6+.
review_text: Warning: This watch will not work with iPhone 6+. You must have iPhone 6s.Much old information posted out there is just wrong. You must upgrade to a least iPhone 6s or 7.Very disappointed with Apple.

review_title: Great overall watch for the price.
review_text: Works great I use it for working out every day. It tracks my steps , calories burned and distance I have traveled. GPS unteathered feature is awesome as they have maps that you can download and it will show you where exactly where you are on the map on your watch. The battery is great I get a full 2 days use out of it while in use.

I love this watch so much from the beautiful design to the fun features it comes with! I’m a student and this watch is very helpful because it helps me track my heart rate to make sure I’m not overly stressed and it tells me to breath at random times which helps me with stress too. Overall this is a great product and an even better one for students!

review_title: Good to teach your exercise goals
review_text: I never used the sleep tracking. The best part is using it for exercise, finding my phone, and answering it when your phone was not around

Cool product but I realized I'm not a watch person and having a big chunk of metal on my wrist just made me feel odd.But the product is good and would suggest it to anyone that loves electronics.Only problem now is waiting on the refund to kick in.It's been more than 7 days and I still haven't received any information on refund when I see the package was delivered.
Switched from a Fitbit Ionic to the Apple Watch. I had better sleep insights in and all in one app with the Fitbit, but love the overall connectivity of devices with the Apple.

review_title: Great battery life , easy to use
review_text: First day having it and it’s perfect so far. I needed a watch for when I’m busy at work and need to send a quick reply when I get a text or be able to answer if there’s an emergency.

I have only had this a few days and I love it. I am using it a lot and even for sleep tracking so I was concerned with battery life. Not only does the battery last a lot longer than I expected, it charges even faster!

review_title: The band doesn’t stay on very well
review_text: I went swimming with this thing in the river one time and the band came undone. It does not stay on very well at all. Now I’m out a watch

She loves her watch. It does a great job tracking activity, however I haven’t found an option to track sleep. Everything I’ve seen are paid apps. That’s not a big deal, but seems odd to charge so much when there are other options available that do all

review_title: Most user friendly watch for those on the go <U+0001F44D><U+0001F3FD>
review_text: Love love love my watch! So much better days since I have it. Syncs with all my apple products so makes life much smoother.It does seems to lose charge faster with more activity but I guess that’s to be expected. I’d buy another one any day and for friends and family too. Also enjoy how the screen savers are so diverse and I can even use my personal photos as well.
I love it, I took a long time thinking and wondering if I needed one being that I have a bunch of watches with dead batteries, but I love love love it

This Apple Watch is original and exactly as described. It comes in a sealed original box with the charger included. I had lost my previous series two and I was a little hesitant cause I thought maybe this watch would be used or damaged, but it was brand new and in perfect condition. I definitely recommend!

review_title: You get what you pay for.
review_text: Hasn’t worked properly since the day we got it and despite the fact that we’ve talked to multiple tech support reps over the last 6 months to restart the watch they still won’t replace it. Don’t buy from Amazon, just buy it from an Apple store so you have the proper warranty and tech support in place.
This one is amazing!!!<U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F>

I bought the 42 for my sister with a very small wrist. She loves it! Synced right up with her iPhone SE. Works great! I will say the description said the adapter was included but it wasn’t. Just so you know to be prepared for that. Overall great! Packaged great, arrived on time too!

This phone is sold at a good price and has good apps/features. However, the main reason I wanted this phone was to be active and track my runs. I learned you have to have your phone with you at all times if you want to play music, which is a deal breaker for me. I have Spotify and hate that I can't download music to my phone. I really liked the watch just not willing to keep my phone on me while I run and bike.

review_title: This watch is great, very convenient in the gym
review_text: My wrists are small so I chose 38mm, and it fits well. This watch is great, very convenient in the gym. I carry it daily and the battery is very good.
My husband absolutely loves his watch. It doesn’t come with a screen protector so we had to buy that separate.

Exactly what I was wanting!It comes with the cord but not the cube charger.I use usb to charge anyway so not a issue.My daughter bought hers directly from Apple and she received same cord and no cube .charger. And warranty is with Apple

My fitbit died and I decided to pick up one of these as a replacement. I can't express how much this blows my old fitbit out of the water. It's easy to use, it tracks everything, and as a bonus, it gives me my notifications so I don't always need my phone with me.Love it!
Birthday present for mom.It’s perfect!Arrived still sealed in its original package.The watch is flawless with zero scuffs and scratches.

As my first smart watch. I love everything about this. The price is good. It does everything. The speaker is good and The voice to text is much better than my phones voice to text. I went with the 33mm and it fits my wrist well. any bigger and it would hit into everything.
Received my Apple Watch and it was not brand new it was connected to someone else’s Apple ID wasn’t able to use had to get it replaced

It came quick in the mail for a great price. Works as intended, comes as its supposed to. It even came in packaging that makes it look like a normal package - I was slightly worried about how it would deliver just because of it being an apple watch and an item that could be potentially stolen but didn't have to worry about it!

review_title: Great smart watch! I love it
review_text: I’ve always wanted an Apple Watch and this one exceeds my expectations. You won’t realize that you needed one until it’s on your wrist, then you can’t live with out it.
me encanto , llego en perfectas condiciones agregué la protección por 2 años porque el anterior lo perdí por un golpe en la pantalla y, le compré el estuche para la pantalla!

I bought this Apple Watch for my girlfriend's birthday. She LOVED it. Every single feature, the battery, the compatibility, everything. However, for some reason, she is getting some allergic reactions with the band the Apple Watch came with. I dont know if it is just her or the band does give you some kind of reaction when you use it for longer periods of time. Other than that, she is completely happy with it.

review_title: Why did I wait to so long to buy an Apple Watch
review_text: Great buy. Sync well with my iPhone 6s. I can answer and make calls [and much more] from my watch just as long as my phone is near buy. The activity rings motivates you to be active. I wouldn’t get any other watch or fitness tracker, if I am a iPhone user. The compatibility cannot be beat. One last thing, I can go almost 2.5 days without charging my watch.
Battery life seems to be normal.She wears and uses it all day, charges at night.Series 3, does as expected. Came with white band.

Came from a series 1 and this series 3 is much faster and responsive. Before my messages wouldn't sync to the watch which was very frustrating and now they come in as soon as they come in on my phone.

review_title: Apple Watch series 3 will not stay on during day
review_text: This entire experience has been horrible! Have had the Apple Watch series 3 less than 2 months. Bought brand new. It is constantly shutting down and losing charge 3-4 times a day. I have spent hours on the phone with amazon support and apple and the only options I am getting is I either pay $235 to mail it in to be fixed or I have to take it an hr away to an authorized apple repair place. This is very sad since it was just bought brand new. In my opinion I should be sent a new product <U+0001F621>
Love this watch. I barely take it off. The battery lasts all day and charges very fast. I like to use it to monitor my sleep and it seems to do a very good job at it.
Loved this while it lasted. The watch just stopped working and I haven’t even had it 2 years. Used it everyday but took great care of it so very disappointing that It didn’tlast longer
I use this at work every day and it’s pretty awesome! Great to have when you need to quick glance at things and can’t pick up your phone

I love amazon so when i went on here looking for an apple watch I was pleased to see the discount and was excited to purchase. The packaging and everything was perfect came in a box that was a little skeptical compared to others but it had the same thing in the box as an Apple Watch you’d get out of the apple store. Only thing is it didn’t come with a charging box. Everything else was in the box.

review_title: Doesn’t charge well. Seems to be refurbished?
review_text: Never charges to 100% on its own. Have to pick up and put on 4 times for full charge. Doesn’t include charger blocker so I bought an Apple one and it still doesn’t work. Doesn’t work normally on other friends’ chargers. Spent $100 on accessories and it won’t even charge correctly. 5/5 regret buying it
I am an Apple fan and decided to upgrade my old Iwatch for this one.Main improvement is battery life.As usual in an Apple product, excellent quality.

My husband loves his watch! It does everything he hoped for and more. He can communicate with his phone, answer calls, check messages and texts. It tracks his physical activity including sleep. Battery is typical of apple products and it lasts him through the day wo recharging.
I really recommended for the price. Is the same you got at the Apple web store. When I got it it was new at all. I used with my iPhone everyday and I had no issue. Such a really good inversion

I like the fact that I track my movement for steps and exercises plus if I want my sleep and get notifications for msgs and emails and that I can replay via my watch .I do wish the battery life was longer but charging it first thing in the morning works well.
use it mostly for health/fitness tracking. I know there are a ton of features that i dont take advantage of but everything i've tried or use is great. Havent had any issues with it yet.

Good for the price ! My husband and I just got new I phones but I didn’t wanna pay a lot for the I watch so I got this one on here it works great and does a lot of things I prefer it over any Fitbit ! It was cheaper then a Fitbit when I bought it on here too.
Father’s Day gift for hubby. He loves it and is not techno savvy. Learned to use itvery quickly. Never boasts about gifts but does boast about his new watch.

review_title: Good price and love how it tracks my fitness. Really happy with the buy.

Legitimate Apple Watch and works as it should

I bought this for my daughter for Christmas rather than going to our carrier and we couldn’t be happier! It’s great quality and exactly what it should be! I actually just reordered last night for myself except I bought the white band one this time around!

Bought this watch for my father on Father’s Day but I used it for a week to test it out. I’m now buying another because this watch is so useful and easy to use. My father has told me he really enjoys it too.
Great purchase.Very fast arrival.

I am now checking my steps on this watch. There are so many good reasons to have this watch! Very pleased and easy to use. I can check for messages heart rate etc.

This watch was easy to set up. The layout of multiple apps is nice and makes it easy to find. I can text, answer my phone, even receive pictures on my watch. Very happy with this purchase.

So happy I was able to get this at such a great price. Made it much easier to purchase and upgrade from a fitbit. Love how it can track your exercise so easily. It motivates me to get in a quick workout daily to be consistent!!

review_title: Series 3 is by far the best series
review_text: I love everything about this watch! I had the 42mm but my screen cracked and it cost way too much to get it fixed ($210) the same amount I paid for a brand new watch, just downgrade in size, which is fine with me. The watch came with a S/M band and a M/L band and with the charging cable but not the power block. (I’m sure if you owned a few iPhones, you should have a old block laying around) Be sure to get AppleCare+ or insurance through your carrier within 30 days I believe or else you’ll end up like me buying a completely new watch!!!
Im happy with this watch. The price is good considering the comparable fit bit watch costs just as much and I would rather have an apple product.
The Watch came in Brand New in Original packaging. It also came sooner than expected.

Bought this for my sisters 17th birthday and she absolutely loves it!!! She loves the sleep tracker, the activity tracking, texting on it and playing mini games on it!! She loves it! I was skeptical at first purchasing an Apple Watch from amazon but I was proven wrong when it arrived! I’m gonna have to order one for myself!
I upgraded to an Apple Watch from a Fitbit Charge 2 and wish I would’ve done it sooner. I absolutely love my watch. It’s worth it!

I have always used Apple products and I recommend them to a lot of people. My second generation screen broke off so I bought this one to replace it. Works great and paired easily. I recommend this product to anyone wanting a watch or upgrading.

review_title: Horrible Apple Experience and Customer Service
review_text: The Apple Watch overheated and it was so hot when I picked it up that I had to let go of it. It made a tiny scratch on the corner and Apple refused to repair it without me covering the cost of the glass(which was basically the cost of the watch) before they looked into the defective issue. Apple is horrible at responding to issues their products have and will find ways to make you cover the cost when it’s still in warranty.

I'm able to keep track of time and notifications easily through this device. If you're on the fence about getting one of these, you should definitely buy one if you have the means.

From day 1 I AM OBSESSED.
